00025 //
00026 btSoftBody::btSoftBody(btSoftBodyWorldInfo*     worldInfo,int node_count,  const btVector3* x,  const btScalar* m)
00027 :m_softBodySolver(0),m_worldInfo(worldInfo)
00028 {       
00029         /* Init         */ 
00030         initDefaults();
00031 
00032         /* Default material     */ 
00033         Material*       pm=appendMaterial();
00034         pm->m_kLST      =       1;
00035         pm->m_kAST      =       1;
00036         pm->m_kVST      =       1;
00037         pm->m_flags     =       fMaterial::Default;
00038 
00039         /* Nodes                        */ 
00040         const btScalar          margin=getCollisionShape()->getMargin();
00041         m_nodes.resize(node_count);
00042         for(int i=0,ni=node_count;i<ni;++i)
00043         {       
00044                 Node&   n=m_nodes[i];
00045                 ZeroInitialize(n);
00046                 n.m_x           =       x?*x++:btVector3(0,0,0);
00047                 n.m_q           =       n.m_x;
00048                 n.m_im          =       m?*m++:1;
00049                 n.m_im          =       n.m_im>0?1/n.m_im:0;
00050                 n.m_leaf        =       m_ndbvt.insert(btDbvtVolume::FromCR(n.m_x,margin),&n);
00051                 n.m_material=   pm;
00052         }
00053         updateBounds(); 
00054 
00055 }
00056 
00057 btSoftBody::btSoftBody(btSoftBodyWorldInfo*     worldInfo)
00058 :m_worldInfo(worldInfo)
00059 {
00060         initDefaults();
00061 }

00064 void    btSoftBody::initDefaults()
00065 {
00066         m_internalType          =       CO_SOFT_BODY;
00067         m_cfg.aeromodel         =       eAeroModel::V_Point;
00068         m_cfg.kVCF                      =       1;
00069         m_cfg.kDG                       =       0;
00070         m_cfg.kLF                       =       0;
00071         m_cfg.kDP                       =       0;
00072         m_cfg.kPR                       =       0;
00073         m_cfg.kVC                       =       0;
00074         m_cfg.kDF                       =       (btScalar)0.2;
00075         m_cfg.kMT                       =       0;
00076         m_cfg.kCHR                      =       (btScalar)1.0;
00077         m_cfg.kKHR                      =       (btScalar)0.1;
00078         m_cfg.kSHR                      =       (btScalar)1.0;
00079         m_cfg.kAHR                      =       (btScalar)0.7;
00080         m_cfg.kSRHR_CL          =       (btScalar)0.1;
00081         m_cfg.kSKHR_CL          =       (btScalar)1;
00082         m_cfg.kSSHR_CL          =       (btScalar)0.5;
00083         m_cfg.kSR_SPLT_CL       =       (btScalar)0.5;
00084         m_cfg.kSK_SPLT_CL       =       (btScalar)0.5;
00085         m_cfg.kSS_SPLT_CL       =       (btScalar)0.5;
00086         m_cfg.maxvolume         =       (btScalar)1;
00087         m_cfg.timescale         =       1;
00088         m_cfg.viterations       =       0;
00089         m_cfg.piterations       =       1;      
00090         m_cfg.diterations       =       0;
00091         m_cfg.citerations       =       4;
00092         m_cfg.collisions        =       fCollision::Default;
00093         m_pose.m_bvolume        =       false;
00094         m_pose.m_bframe         =       false;
00095         m_pose.m_volume         =       0;
00096         m_pose.m_com            =       btVector3(0,0,0);
00097         m_pose.m_rot.setIdentity();
00098         m_pose.m_scl.setIdentity();
00099         m_tag                           =       0;
00100         m_timeacc                       =       0;
00101         m_bUpdateRtCst          =       true;
00102         m_bounds[0]                     =       btVector3(0,0,0);
00103         m_bounds[1]                     =       btVector3(0,0,0);
00104         m_worldTransform.setIdentity();
00105         setSolver(eSolverPresets::Positions);
00106         
00107         /* Collision shape      */ 
00109         m_collisionShape = new btSoftBodyCollisionShape(this);
00110         m_collisionShape->setMargin(0.25f);
00111         
00112         m_initialWorldTransform.setIdentity();
00113 
00114         m_windVelocity = btVector3(0,0,0);
00115         m_restLengthScale = btScalar(1.0);
00116 }

00118 //
00119 btSoftBody::~btSoftBody()
00120 {
00121         //for now, delete the internal shape
00122         delete m_collisionShape;        
00123         int i;
00124 
00125         releaseClusters();
00126         for(i=0;i<m_materials.size();++i) 
00127                 btAlignedFree(m_materials[i]);
00128         for(i=0;i<m_joints.size();++i) 
00129                 btAlignedFree(m_joints[i]);
00130 }

00134 {
00135         return(checkLink(&m_nodes[node0],&m_nodes[node1]));

00138 //
00139 bool                    btSoftBody::checkLink(const Node* node0,const Node* node1) const
00140 {
00141         const Node*     n[]={node0,node1};
00142         for(int i=0,ni=m_links.size();i<ni;++i)
00143         {
00144                 const Link&     l=m_links[i];
00145                 if(     (l.m_n[0]==n[0]&&l.m_n[1]==n[1])||
00146                         (l.m_n[0]==n[1]&&l.m_n[1]==n[0]))
00147                 {
00148                         return(true);
00149                 }
00150         }
00151         return(false);
00152 }
00153 
00154 //
00155 bool                    btSoftBody::checkFace(int node0,int node1,int node2) const
00156 {
00157         const Node*     n[]={   &m_nodes[node0],
00158                 &m_nodes[node1],
00159                 &m_nodes[node2]};
00160         for(int i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
00161         {
00162                 const Face&     f=m_faces[i];
00163                 int                     c=0;
00164                 for(int j=0;j<3;++j)
00165                 {
00166                         if(     (f.m_n[j]==n[0])||
00167                                 (f.m_n[j]==n[1])||
00168                                 (f.m_n[j]==n[2])) c|=1<<j; else break;
00169                 }
00170                 if(c==7) return(true);
00171         }
00172         return(false);
00173 }

00175 //
00176 btSoftBody::Material*           btSoftBody::appendMaterial()
00177 {
00178         Material*       pm=new(btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(Material),16)) Material();
00179         if(m_materials.size()>0)
00180                 *pm=*m_materials[0];
00181         else
00182                 ZeroInitialize(*pm);
00183         m_materials.push_back(pm);
00184         return(pm);
00185 }

00187 //
00188 void                    btSoftBody::appendNote( const char* text,
00189                                                                            const btVector3& o,
00190                                                                            const btVector4& c,
00191                                                                            Node* n0,
00192                                                                            Node* n1,
00193                                                                            Node* n2,
00194                                                                            Node* n3)
00195 {
00196         Note    n;
00197         ZeroInitialize(n);
00198         n.m_rank                =       0;
00199         n.m_text                =       text;
00200         n.m_offset              =       o;
00201         n.m_coords[0]   =       c.x();
00202         n.m_coords[1]   =       c.y();
00203         n.m_coords[2]   =       c.z();
00204         n.m_coords[3]   =       c.w();
00205         n.m_nodes[0]    =       n0;n.m_rank+=n0?1:0;
00206         n.m_nodes[1]    =       n1;n.m_rank+=n1?1:0;
00207         n.m_nodes[2]    =       n2;n.m_rank+=n2?1:0;
00208         n.m_nodes[3]    =       n3;n.m_rank+=n3?1:0;
00209         m_notes.push_back(n);
00210 }

00241 //
00242 void                    btSoftBody::appendNode( const btVector3& x,btScalar m)
00243 {
00244         if(m_nodes.capacity()==m_nodes.size())
00245         {
00246                 pointersToIndices();
00247                 m_nodes.reserve(m_nodes.size()*2+1);
00248                 indicesToPointers();
00249         }
00250         const btScalar  margin=getCollisionShape()->getMargin();
00251         m_nodes.push_back(Node());
00252         Node&                   n=m_nodes[m_nodes.size()-1];
00253         ZeroInitialize(n);
00254         n.m_x                   =       x;
00255         n.m_q                   =       n.m_x;
00256         n.m_im                  =       m>0?1/m:0;
00257         n.m_material    =       m_materials[0];
00258         n.m_leaf                =       m_ndbvt.insert(btDbvtVolume::FromCR(n.m_x,margin),&n);
00259 }

00261 //
00262 void                    btSoftBody::appendLink(int model,Material* mat)
00263 {
00264         Link    l;
00265         if(model>=0)
00266                 l=m_links[model];
00267         else
00268         { ZeroInitialize(l);l.m_material=mat?mat:m_materials[0]; }
00269         m_links.push_back(l);
00270 }

00272 //
00273 void                    btSoftBody::appendLink( int node0,
00274                                                                            int node1,
00275                                                                            Material* mat,
00276                                                                            bool bcheckexist)
00277 {
00278         appendLink(&m_nodes[node0],&m_nodes[node1],mat,bcheckexist);
00279 }
00280 
00281 //
00282 void                    btSoftBody::appendLink( Node* node0,
00283                                                                            Node* node1,
00284                                                                            Material* mat,
00285                                                                            bool bcheckexist)
00286 {
00287         if((!bcheckexist)||(!checkLink(node0,node1)))
00288         {
00289                 appendLink(-1,mat);
00290                 Link&   l=m_links[m_links.size()-1];
00291                 l.m_n[0]                =       node0;
00292                 l.m_n[1]                =       node1;
00293                 l.m_rl                  =       (l.m_n[0]->m_x-l.m_n[1]->m_x).length();
00294                 m_bUpdateRtCst=true;
00295         }
00296 }

00298 //
00299 void                    btSoftBody::appendFace(int model,Material* mat)
00300 {
00301         Face    f;
00302         if(model>=0)
00303         { f=m_faces[model]; }
00304         else
00305         { ZeroInitialize(f);f.m_material=mat?mat:m_materials[0]; }
00306         m_faces.push_back(f);
00307 }
00308 
00309 //
00310 void                    btSoftBody::appendFace(int node0,int node1,int node2,Material* mat)
00311 {
00312         if (node0==node1)
00313                 return;
00314         if (node1==node2)
00315                 return;
00316         if (node2==node0)
00317                 return;
00318 
00319         appendFace(-1,mat);
00320         Face&   f=m_faces[m_faces.size()-1];
00321         btAssert(node0!=node1);
00322         btAssert(node1!=node2);
00323         btAssert(node2!=node0);
00324         f.m_n[0]        =       &m_nodes[node0];
00325         f.m_n[1]        =       &m_nodes[node1];
00326         f.m_n[2]        =       &m_nodes[node2];
00327         f.m_ra          =       AreaOf( f.m_n[0]->m_x,
00328                 f.m_n[1]->m_x,
00329                 f.m_n[2]->m_x); 
00330         m_bUpdateRtCst=true;
00331 }

00344 //
00345 void                    btSoftBody::appendTetra(int node0,
00346                                                                                 int node1,
00347                                                                                 int node2,
00348                                                                                 int node3,
00349                                                                                 Material* mat)
00350 {
00351         appendTetra(-1,mat);
00352         Tetra&  t=m_tetras[m_tetras.size()-1];
00353         t.m_n[0]        =       &m_nodes[node0];
00354         t.m_n[1]        =       &m_nodes[node1];
00355         t.m_n[2]        =       &m_nodes[node2];
00356         t.m_n[3]        =       &m_nodes[node3];
00357         t.m_rv          =       VolumeOf(t.m_n[0]->m_x,t.m_n[1]->m_x,t.m_n[2]->m_x,t.m_n[3]->m_x);
00358         m_bUpdateRtCst=true;
00359 }

00369 //
00370 void                    btSoftBody::appendAnchor(int node,btRigidBody* body, const btVector3& localPivot,bool disableCollisionBetweenLinkedBodies,btScalar influence)
00371 {
00372         if (disableCollisionBetweenLinkedBodies)
00373         {
00374                 if (m_collisionDisabledObjects.findLinearSearch(body)==m_collisionDisabledObjects.size())
00375                 {
00376                         m_collisionDisabledObjects.push_back(body);
00377                 }
00378         }
00379 
00380         Anchor  a;
00381         a.m_node                        =       &m_nodes[node];
00382         a.m_body                        =       body;
00383         a.m_local                       =       localPivot;
00384         a.m_node->m_battach     =       1;
00385         a.m_influence = influence;
00386         m_anchors.push_back(a);
00387 }

00389 //
00390 void                    btSoftBody::appendLinearJoint(const LJoint::Specs& specs,Cluster* body0,Body body1)
00391 {
00392         LJoint*         pj      =       new(btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(LJoint),16)) LJoint();
00393         pj->m_bodies[0] =       body0;
00394         pj->m_bodies[1] =       body1;
00395         pj->m_refs[0]   =       pj->m_bodies[0].xform().inverse()*specs.position;
00396         pj->m_refs[1]   =       pj->m_bodies[1].xform().inverse()*specs.position;
00397         pj->m_cfm               =       specs.cfm;
00398         pj->m_erp               =       specs.erp;
00399         pj->m_split             =       specs.split;
00400         m_joints.push_back(pj);
00401 }

00415 //
00416 void                    btSoftBody::appendAngularJoint(const AJoint::Specs& specs,Cluster* body0,Body body1)
00417 {
00418         AJoint*         pj      =       new(btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(AJoint),16)) AJoint();
00419         pj->m_bodies[0] =       body0;
00420         pj->m_bodies[1] =       body1;
00421         pj->m_refs[0]   =       pj->m_bodies[0].xform().inverse().getBasis()*specs.axis;

00423         pj->m_cfm               =       specs.cfm;
00424         pj->m_erp               =       specs.erp;
00425         pj->m_split             =       specs.split;
00426         pj->m_icontrol  =       specs.icontrol;
00427         m_joints.push_back(pj);

00448 //
00449 void                    btSoftBody::addForce(const btVector3& force,int node)
00450 {
00451         Node&   n=m_nodes[node];
00452         if(n.m_im>0)
00453         {
00454                 n.m_f   +=      force;
00455         }

00457 
00458 void                    btSoftBody::addAeroForceToNode(const btVector3& windVelocity,int nodeIndex)
00459 {
00460         btAssert(nodeIndex >= 0 && nodeIndex < m_nodes.size());
00461 
00462         const btScalar dt = m_sst.sdt;
00463         const btScalar kLF = m_cfg.kLF;
00464         const btScalar kDG = m_cfg.kDG;
00465         //const btScalar kPR = m_cfg.kPR;
00466         //const btScalar kVC = m_cfg.kVC;
00467         const bool as_lift = kLF>0;
00468         const bool as_drag = kDG>0;
00469         const bool as_aero = as_lift || as_drag;
00470         const bool as_vaero = as_aero && (m_cfg.aeromodel < btSoftBody::eAeroModel::F_TwoSided);
00471 
00472         Node& n = m_nodes[nodeIndex];
00473 
00474         if( n.m_im>0 )
00475         {
00476                 btSoftBody::sMedium     medium;
00477 
00478                 EvaluateMedium(m_worldInfo, n.m_x, medium);
00479                 medium.m_velocity = windVelocity;
00480                 medium.m_density = m_worldInfo->air_density;
00481 
00482                 /* Aerodynamics                 */ 
00483                 if(as_vaero)
00484                 {                               
00485                         const btVector3 rel_v = n.m_v - medium.m_velocity;                                      
00486                         const btScalar rel_v_len = rel_v.length();
00487                         const btScalar  rel_v2 = rel_v.length2();
00488 
00489                         if(rel_v2>SIMD_EPSILON)
00490                         {
00491                                 const btVector3 rel_v_nrm = rel_v.normalized();
00492                                 btVector3       nrm = n.m_n;                                            
00493 
00494                                 if (m_cfg.aeromodel == btSoftBody::eAeroModel::V_TwoSidedLiftDrag)
00495                                 {
00496                                         nrm *= (btScalar)( (btDot(nrm,rel_v) < 0) ? -1 : +1);
00497                                         btVector3 fDrag(0, 0, 0);
00498                                         btVector3 fLift(0, 0, 0);
00499 
00500                                         btScalar n_dot_v = nrm.dot(rel_v_nrm);
00501                                         btScalar tri_area = 0.5f * n.m_area;
00502                                                         
00503                                         fDrag = 0.5f * kDG * medium.m_density * rel_v2 * tri_area * n_dot_v * (-rel_v_nrm);
00504                                                         
00505                                         // Check angle of attack
00506                                         // cos(10º) = 0.98480
00507                                         if ( 0 < n_dot_v && n_dot_v < 0.98480f)
00508                                                 fLift = 0.5f * kLF * medium.m_density * rel_v_len * tri_area * btSqrt(1.0f-n_dot_v*n_dot_v) * (nrm.cross(rel_v_nrm).cross(rel_v_nrm));
00509 
00510                                         // Check if the velocity change resulted by aero drag force exceeds the current velocity of the node.
00511                                         btVector3 del_v_by_fDrag = fDrag*n.m_im*m_sst.sdt;                                                                              
00512                                         btScalar del_v_by_fDrag_len2 = del_v_by_fDrag.length2();
00513                                         btScalar v_len2 = n.m_v.length2();
00514 
00515                                         if (del_v_by_fDrag_len2 >= v_len2 && del_v_by_fDrag_len2 > 0)
00516                                         {
00517                                                 btScalar del_v_by_fDrag_len = del_v_by_fDrag.length();
00518                                                 btScalar v_len = n.m_v.length();
00519                                                 fDrag *= btScalar(0.8)*(v_len / del_v_by_fDrag_len);
00520                                         }
00521 
00522                                         n.m_f += fDrag;
00523                                         n.m_f += fLift;
00524                                 }
00525                                 else if (m_cfg.aeromodel == btSoftBody::eAeroModel::V_Point || m_cfg.aeromodel == btSoftBody::eAeroModel::V_OneSided || m_cfg.aeromodel == btSoftBody::eAeroModel::V_TwoSided)
00526                                 {
00527                                         if (m_cfg.aeromodel == btSoftBody::eAeroModel::V_TwoSided)
00528                                                 nrm *= (btScalar)( (btDot(nrm,rel_v) < 0) ? -1 : +1);
00529 
00530                                         const btScalar dvn = btDot(rel_v,nrm);
00531                                         /* Compute forces       */ 
00532                                         if(dvn>0)
00533                                         {
00534                                                 btVector3               force(0,0,0);
00535                                                 const btScalar  c0      =       n.m_area * dvn * rel_v2/2;
00536                                                 const btScalar  c1      =       c0 * medium.m_density;
00537                                                 force   +=      nrm*(-c1*kLF);
00538                                                 force   +=      rel_v.normalized() * (-c1 * kDG);
00539                                                 ApplyClampedForce(n, force, dt);
00540                                         }
00541                                 }       
00542                         }
00543                 }
00544         }
00545 }
00546 
00547 void                    btSoftBody::addAeroForceToFace(const btVector3& windVelocity,int faceIndex)
00548 {
00549         const btScalar dt = m_sst.sdt;
00550         const btScalar kLF = m_cfg.kLF;
00551         const btScalar kDG = m_cfg.kDG;
00552 //      const btScalar kPR = m_cfg.kPR;
00553 //      const btScalar kVC = m_cfg.kVC;
00554         const bool as_lift = kLF>0;
00555         const bool as_drag = kDG>0;
00556         const bool as_aero = as_lift || as_drag;
00557         const bool as_faero = as_aero && (m_cfg.aeromodel >= btSoftBody::eAeroModel::F_TwoSided);
00558 
00559         if(as_faero)
00560         {
00561                 btSoftBody::Face&       f=m_faces[faceIndex];
00562 
00563                 btSoftBody::sMedium     medium;
00564                 
00565                 const btVector3 v=(f.m_n[0]->m_v+f.m_n[1]->m_v+f.m_n[2]->m_v)/3;
00566                 const btVector3 x=(f.m_n[0]->m_x+f.m_n[1]->m_x+f.m_n[2]->m_x)/3;
00567                 EvaluateMedium(m_worldInfo,x,medium);
00568                 medium.m_velocity = windVelocity;
00569                 medium.m_density = m_worldInfo->air_density;
00570                 const btVector3 rel_v=v-medium.m_velocity;
00571                 const btScalar rel_v_len = rel_v.length();
00572                 const btScalar  rel_v2=rel_v.length2();
00573 
00574                 if(rel_v2>SIMD_EPSILON)
00575                 {
00576                         const btVector3 rel_v_nrm = rel_v.normalized();
00577                         btVector3       nrm = f.m_normal;
00578 
00579                         if (m_cfg.aeromodel == btSoftBody::eAeroModel::F_TwoSidedLiftDrag)
00580                         {
00581                                 nrm *= (btScalar)( (btDot(nrm,rel_v) < 0) ? -1 : +1);
00582 
00583                                 btVector3 fDrag(0, 0, 0);
00584                                 btVector3 fLift(0, 0, 0);
00585 
00586                                 btScalar n_dot_v = nrm.dot(rel_v_nrm);
00587                                 btScalar tri_area = 0.5f * f.m_ra;
00588                                         
00589                                 fDrag = 0.5f * kDG * medium.m_density * rel_v2 * tri_area * n_dot_v * (-rel_v_nrm);
00590 
00591                                 // Check angle of attack
00592                                 // cos(10º) = 0.98480
00593                                 if ( 0 < n_dot_v && n_dot_v < 0.98480f)
00594                                         fLift = 0.5f * kLF * medium.m_density * rel_v_len * tri_area * btSqrt(1.0f-n_dot_v*n_dot_v) * (nrm.cross(rel_v_nrm).cross(rel_v_nrm));
00595 
00596                                 fDrag /= 3;
00597                                 fLift /= 3;
00598 
00599                                 for(int j=0;j<3;++j) 
00600                                 {
00601                                         if (f.m_n[j]->m_im>0)
00602                                         {
00603                                                 // Check if the velocity change resulted by aero drag force exceeds the current velocity of the node.
00604                                                 btVector3 del_v_by_fDrag = fDrag*f.m_n[j]->m_im*m_sst.sdt;                                                                              
00605                                                 btScalar del_v_by_fDrag_len2 = del_v_by_fDrag.length2();
00606                                                 btScalar v_len2 = f.m_n[j]->m_v.length2();
00607 
00608                                                 if (del_v_by_fDrag_len2 >= v_len2 && del_v_by_fDrag_len2 > 0)
00609                                                 {
00610                                                         btScalar del_v_by_fDrag_len = del_v_by_fDrag.length();
00611                                                         btScalar v_len = f.m_n[j]->m_v.length();
00612                                                         fDrag *= btScalar(0.8)*(v_len / del_v_by_fDrag_len);
00613                                                 }
00614 
00615                                                 f.m_n[j]->m_f += fDrag; 
00616                                                 f.m_n[j]->m_f += fLift;
00617                                         }
00618                                 }
00619                         }
00620                         else if (m_cfg.aeromodel == btSoftBody::eAeroModel::F_OneSided || m_cfg.aeromodel == btSoftBody::eAeroModel::F_TwoSided)
00621                         {
00622                                 if (m_cfg.aeromodel == btSoftBody::eAeroModel::F_TwoSided)
00623                                         nrm *= (btScalar)( (btDot(nrm,rel_v) < 0) ? -1 : +1);
00624 
00625                                 const btScalar  dvn=btDot(rel_v,nrm);
00626                                 /* Compute forces       */ 
00627                                 if(dvn>0)
00628                                 {
00629                                         btVector3               force(0,0,0);
00630                                         const btScalar  c0      =       f.m_ra*dvn*rel_v2;
00631                                         const btScalar  c1      =       c0*medium.m_density;
00632                                         force   +=      nrm*(-c1*kLF);
00633                                         force   +=      rel_v.normalized()*(-c1*kDG);
00634                                         force   /=      3;
00635                                         for(int j=0;j<3;++j) ApplyClampedForce(*f.m_n[j],force,dt);
00636                                 }
00637                         }
00638                 }
00639         }
00640 
00641 }
00642 
00643 //
00644 void                    btSoftBody::addVelocity(const btVector3& velocity)
00645 {
00646         for(int i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i) addVelocity(velocity,i);
00647 }
00648 
00649 /* Set velocity for the entire body                                                                             */ 
00650 void                            btSoftBody::setVelocity(        const btVector3& velocity)
00651 {
00652         for(int i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i) 
00653         {
00654                 Node&   n=m_nodes[i];
00655                 if(n.m_im>0)
00656                 {
00657                         n.m_v   =       velocity;
00658                 }
00659         }
00660 }
00661 
00662 
00663 //
00664 void                    btSoftBody::addVelocity(const btVector3& velocity,int node)
00665 {
00666         Node&   n=m_nodes[node];
00667         if(n.m_im>0)
00668         {
00669                 n.m_v   +=      velocity;
00670         }
00671 }
00672 
00673 //
00674 void                    btSoftBody::setMass(int node,btScalar mass)
00675 {
00676         m_nodes[node].m_im=mass>0?1/mass:0;
00677         m_bUpdateRtCst=true;
00678 }
00679 
00680 //
00681 btScalar                btSoftBody::getMass(int node) const
00682 {
00683         return(m_nodes[node].m_im>0?1/m_nodes[node].m_im:0);
00684 }
00685 
00686 //
00687 btScalar                btSoftBody::getTotalMass() const
00688 {
00689         btScalar        mass=0;
00690         for(int i=0;i<m_nodes.size();++i)
00691         {
00692                 mass+=getMass(i);
00693         }
00694         return(mass);
00695 }
00696 
00697 //
00698 void                    btSoftBody::setTotalMass(btScalar mass,bool fromfaces)
00699 {
00700         int i;
00701 
00702         if(fromfaces)
00703         {
00704 
00705                 for(i=0;i<m_nodes.size();++i)
00706                 {
00707                         m_nodes[i].m_im=0;
00708                 }
00709                 for(i=0;i<m_faces.size();++i)
00710                 {
00711                         const Face&             f=m_faces[i];
00712                         const btScalar  twicearea=AreaOf(       f.m_n[0]->m_x,
00713                                 f.m_n[1]->m_x,
00714                                 f.m_n[2]->m_x);
00715                         for(int j=0;j<3;++j)
00716                         {
00717                                 f.m_n[j]->m_im+=twicearea;
00718                         }
00719                 }
00720                 for( i=0;i<m_nodes.size();++i)
00721                 {
00722                         m_nodes[i].m_im=1/m_nodes[i].m_im;
00723                 }
00724         }
00725         const btScalar  tm=getTotalMass();
00726         const btScalar  itm=1/tm;
00727         for( i=0;i<m_nodes.size();++i)
00728         {
00729                 m_nodes[i].m_im/=itm*mass;
00730         }
00731         m_bUpdateRtCst=true;
00732 }
00733 
00734 //
00735 void                    btSoftBody::setTotalDensity(btScalar density)
00736 {
00737         setTotalMass(getVolume()*density,true);
00738 }
00739 
00740 //
00741 void                    btSoftBody::setVolumeMass(btScalar mass)
00742 {
00743 btAlignedObjectArray<btScalar>  ranks;
00744 ranks.resize(m_nodes.size(),0);
00745 int i;
00746 
00747 for(i=0;i<m_nodes.size();++i)
00748         {
00749         m_nodes[i].m_im=0;
00750         }
00751 for(i=0;i<m_tetras.size();++i)
00752         {
00753         const Tetra& t=m_tetras[i];
00754         for(int j=0;j<4;++j)
00755                 {
00756                 t.m_n[j]->m_im+=btFabs(t.m_rv);
00757                 ranks[int(t.m_n[j]-&m_nodes[0])]+=1;
00758                 }
00759         }
00760 for( i=0;i<m_nodes.size();++i)
00761         {
00762         if(m_nodes[i].m_im>0)
00763                 {
00764                 m_nodes[i].m_im=ranks[i]/m_nodes[i].m_im;
00765                 }
00766         }
00767 setTotalMass(mass,false);
00768 }
00769 
00770 //
00771 void                    btSoftBody::setVolumeDensity(btScalar density)
00772 {
00773 btScalar        volume=0;
00774 for(int i=0;i<m_tetras.size();++i)
00775         {
00776         const Tetra& t=m_tetras[i];
00777         for(int j=0;j<4;++j)
00778                 {
00779                 volume+=btFabs(t.m_rv);
00780                 }
00781         }
00782 setVolumeMass(volume*density/6);
00783 }
00784 
00785 //
00786 void                    btSoftBody::transform(const btTransform& trs)
00787 {
00788         const btScalar  margin=getCollisionShape()->getMargin();
00789         ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(btDbvtVolume)       vol;
00790         
00791         for(int i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
00792         {
00793                 Node&   n=m_nodes[i];
00794                 n.m_x=trs*n.m_x;
00795                 n.m_q=trs*n.m_q;
00796                 n.m_n=trs.getBasis()*n.m_n;
00797                 vol = btDbvtVolume::FromCR(n.m_x,margin);
00798                 
00799                 m_ndbvt.update(n.m_leaf,vol);
00800         }
00801         updateNormals();
00802         updateBounds();
00803         updateConstants();
00804         m_initialWorldTransform = trs;
00805 }
00806 
00807 //
00808 void                    btSoftBody::translate(const btVector3& trs)
00809 {
00810         btTransform     t;
00811         t.setIdentity();
00812         t.setOrigin(trs);
00813         transform(t);
00814 }
00815 
00816 //
00817 void                    btSoftBody::rotate(     const btQuaternion& rot)
00818 {
00819         btTransform     t;
00820         t.setIdentity();
00821         t.setRotation(rot);
00822         transform(t);
00823 }
00824 
00825 //
00826 void                    btSoftBody::scale(const btVector3& scl)
00827 {
00828 
00829         const btScalar  margin=getCollisionShape()->getMargin();
00830         ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(btDbvtVolume)       vol;
00831         
00832         for(int i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
00833         {
00834                 Node&   n=m_nodes[i];
00835                 n.m_x*=scl;
00836                 n.m_q*=scl;
00837                 vol = btDbvtVolume::FromCR(n.m_x,margin);
00838                 m_ndbvt.update(n.m_leaf,vol);
00839         }
00840         updateNormals();
00841         updateBounds();
00842         updateConstants();
00843 }
00844 
00845 //
00846 btScalar btSoftBody::getRestLengthScale()
00847 {
00848         return m_restLengthScale;
00849 }
00850 
00851 //
00852 void btSoftBody::setRestLengthScale(btScalar restLengthScale)
00853 {
00854         for(int i=0, ni=m_links.size(); i<ni; ++i)
00855         {
00856                 Link&           l=m_links[i];
00857                 l.m_rl  =       l.m_rl / m_restLengthScale * restLengthScale;
00858                 l.m_c1  =       l.m_rl*l.m_rl;
00859         }
00860         m_restLengthScale = restLengthScale;
00861         
00862         if (getActivationState() == ISLAND_SLEEPING)
00863                 activate();
00864 }
00865 
00866 //
00867 void                    btSoftBody::setPose(bool bvolume,bool bframe)
00868 {
00869         m_pose.m_bvolume        =       bvolume;
00870         m_pose.m_bframe         =       bframe;
00871         int i,ni;
00872 
00873         /* Weights              */ 
00874         const btScalar  omass=getTotalMass();
00875         const btScalar  kmass=omass*m_nodes.size()*1000;
00876         btScalar                tmass=omass;
00877         m_pose.m_wgh.resize(m_nodes.size());
00878         for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
00879         {
00880                 if(m_nodes[i].m_im<=0) tmass+=kmass;
00881         }
00882         for( i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
00883         {
00884                 Node&   n=m_nodes[i];
00885                 m_pose.m_wgh[i]=        n.m_im>0                                        ?
00886                         1/(m_nodes[i].m_im*tmass)       :
00887                 kmass/tmass;
00888         }
00889         /* Pos          */ 
00890         const btVector3 com=evaluateCom();
00891         m_pose.m_pos.resize(m_nodes.size());
00892         for( i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
00893         {
00894                 m_pose.m_pos[i]=m_nodes[i].m_x-com;
00895         }
00896         m_pose.m_volume =       bvolume?getVolume():0;
00897         m_pose.m_com    =       com;
00898         m_pose.m_rot.setIdentity();
00899         m_pose.m_scl.setIdentity();
00900         /* Aqq          */ 
00901         m_pose.m_aqq[0] =
00902                 m_pose.m_aqq[1] =
00903                 m_pose.m_aqq[2] =       btVector3(0,0,0);
00904         for( i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
00905         {
00906                 const btVector3&        q=m_pose.m_pos[i];
00907                 const btVector3         mq=m_pose.m_wgh[i]*q;
00908                 m_pose.m_aqq[0]+=mq.x()*q;
00909                 m_pose.m_aqq[1]+=mq.y()*q;
00910                 m_pose.m_aqq[2]+=mq.z()*q;
00911         }
00912         m_pose.m_aqq=m_pose.m_aqq.inverse();
00913         
00914         updateConstants();
00915 }
00916 
00917 void                            btSoftBody::resetLinkRestLengths()
00918 {
00919         for(int i=0, ni=m_links.size();i<ni;++i)
00920         {
00921                 Link& l =       m_links[i];
00922                 l.m_rl  =       (l.m_n[0]->m_x-l.m_n[1]->m_x).length();
00923                 l.m_c1  =       l.m_rl*l.m_rl;
00924         }
00925 }
00926 
00927 //
00928 btScalar                btSoftBody::getVolume() const
00929 {
00930         btScalar        vol=0;
00931         if(m_nodes.size()>0)
00932         {
00933                 int i,ni;
00934 
00935                 const btVector3 org=m_nodes[0].m_x;
00936                 for(i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
00937                 {
00938                         const Face&     f=m_faces[i];
00939                         vol+=btDot(f.m_n[0]->m_x-org,btCross(f.m_n[1]->m_x-org,f.m_n[2]->m_x-org));
00940                 }
00941                 vol/=(btScalar)6;
00942         }
00943         return(vol);
00944 }
00945 
00946 //
00947 int                             btSoftBody::clusterCount() const
00948 {
00949         return(m_clusters.size());
00950 }
00951 
00952 //
00953 btVector3               btSoftBody::clusterCom(const Cluster* cluster)
00954 {
00955         btVector3               com(0,0,0);
00956         for(int i=0,ni=cluster->m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
00957         {
00958                 com+=cluster->m_nodes[i]->m_x*cluster->m_masses[i];
00959         }
00960         return(com*cluster->m_imass);
00961 }
00962 
00963 //
00964 btVector3               btSoftBody::clusterCom(int cluster) const
00965 {
00966         return(clusterCom(m_clusters[cluster]));
00967 }
00968 
00969 //
00970 btVector3               btSoftBody::clusterVelocity(const Cluster* cluster,const btVector3& rpos)
00971 {
00972         return(cluster->m_lv+btCross(cluster->m_av,rpos));
00973 }
00974 
00975 //
00976 void                    btSoftBody::clusterVImpulse(Cluster* cluster,const btVector3& rpos,const btVector3& impulse)
00977 {
00978         const btVector3 li=cluster->m_imass*impulse;
00979         const btVector3 ai=cluster->m_invwi*btCross(rpos,impulse);
00980         cluster->m_vimpulses[0]+=li;cluster->m_lv+=li;
00981         cluster->m_vimpulses[1]+=ai;cluster->m_av+=ai;
00982         cluster->m_nvimpulses++;
00983 }
00984 
00985 //
00986 void                    btSoftBody::clusterDImpulse(Cluster* cluster,const btVector3& rpos,const btVector3& impulse)
00987 {
00988         const btVector3 li=cluster->m_imass*impulse;
00989         const btVector3 ai=cluster->m_invwi*btCross(rpos,impulse);
00990         cluster->m_dimpulses[0]+=li;
00991         cluster->m_dimpulses[1]+=ai;
00992         cluster->m_ndimpulses++;
00993 }
00994 
00995 //
00996 void                    btSoftBody::clusterImpulse(Cluster* cluster,const btVector3& rpos,const Impulse& impulse)
00997 {
00998         if(impulse.m_asVelocity)        clusterVImpulse(cluster,rpos,impulse.m_velocity);
00999         if(impulse.m_asDrift)           clusterDImpulse(cluster,rpos,impulse.m_drift);
01000 }
01001 
01002 //
01003 void                    btSoftBody::clusterVAImpulse(Cluster* cluster,const btVector3& impulse)
01004 {
01005         const btVector3 ai=cluster->m_invwi*impulse;
01006         cluster->m_vimpulses[1]+=ai;cluster->m_av+=ai;
01007         cluster->m_nvimpulses++;
01008 }
01009 
01010 //
01011 void                    btSoftBody::clusterDAImpulse(Cluster* cluster,const btVector3& impulse)
01012 {
01013         const btVector3 ai=cluster->m_invwi*impulse;
01014         cluster->m_dimpulses[1]+=ai;
01015         cluster->m_ndimpulses++;
01016 }
01017 
01018 //
01019 void                    btSoftBody::clusterAImpulse(Cluster* cluster,const Impulse& impulse)
01020 {
01021         if(impulse.m_asVelocity)        clusterVAImpulse(cluster,impulse.m_velocity);
01022         if(impulse.m_asDrift)           clusterDAImpulse(cluster,impulse.m_drift);
01023 }
01024 
01025 //
01026 void                    btSoftBody::clusterDCImpulse(Cluster* cluster,const btVector3& impulse)
01027 {
01028         cluster->m_dimpulses[0]+=impulse*cluster->m_imass;
01029         cluster->m_ndimpulses++;
01030 }
01031 
01032 struct NodeLinks
01033 {
01034     btAlignedObjectArray<int> m_links;
01035 };
01036 
01037 
01038 
01039 //
01040 int                             btSoftBody::generateBendingConstraints(int distance,Material* mat)
01041 {
01042         int i,j;
01043 
01044         if(distance>1)
01045         {
01046                 /* Build graph  */ 
01047                 const int               n=m_nodes.size();
01048                 const unsigned  inf=(~(unsigned)0)>>1;
01049                 unsigned*               adj=new unsigned[n*n];
01050                 
01051 
01052 #define IDX(_x_,_y_)    ((_y_)*n+(_x_))
01053                 for(j=0;j<n;++j)
01054                 {
01055                         for(i=0;i<n;++i)
01056                         {
01057                                 if(i!=j)
01058                                 {
01059                                         adj[IDX(i,j)]=adj[IDX(j,i)]=inf;
01060                                 }
01061                                 else
01062                                 {
01063                                         adj[IDX(i,j)]=adj[IDX(j,i)]=0;
01064                                 }
01065                         }
01066                 }
01067                 for( i=0;i<m_links.size();++i)
01068                 {
01069                         const int       ia=(int)(m_links[i].m_n[0]-&m_nodes[0]);
01070                         const int       ib=(int)(m_links[i].m_n[1]-&m_nodes[0]);
01071                         adj[IDX(ia,ib)]=1;
01072                         adj[IDX(ib,ia)]=1;
01073                 }
01074 
01075 
01076                 //special optimized case for distance == 2
01077                 if (distance == 2)
01078                 {
01079 
01080                         btAlignedObjectArray<NodeLinks> nodeLinks;
01081 
01082 
01083                         /* Build node links */
01084                         nodeLinks.resize(m_nodes.size());
01085 
01086                         for( i=0;i<m_links.size();++i)
01087                         {
01088                                 const int       ia=(int)(m_links[i].m_n[0]-&m_nodes[0]);
01089                                 const int       ib=(int)(m_links[i].m_n[1]-&m_nodes[0]);
01090                                 if (nodeLinks[ia].m_links.findLinearSearch(ib)==nodeLinks[ia].m_links.size())
01091                                         nodeLinks[ia].m_links.push_back(ib);
01092 
01093                                 if (nodeLinks[ib].m_links.findLinearSearch(ia)==nodeLinks[ib].m_links.size())
01094                                         nodeLinks[ib].m_links.push_back(ia);
01095                         }
01096                         for (int ii=0;ii<nodeLinks.size();ii++)
01097                         {
01098                                 int i=ii;
01099 
01100                                 for (int jj=0;jj<nodeLinks[ii].m_links.size();jj++)
01101                                 {
01102                                         int k = nodeLinks[ii].m_links[jj];
01103                                         for (int kk=0;kk<nodeLinks[k].m_links.size();kk++)
01104                                         {
01105                                                 int j = nodeLinks[k].m_links[kk];
01106                                                 if (i!=j)
01107                                                 {
01108                                                         const unsigned  sum=adj[IDX(i,k)]+adj[IDX(k,j)];
01109                                                         btAssert(sum==2);
01110                                                         if(adj[IDX(i,j)]>sum)
01111                                                         {
01112                                                                 adj[IDX(i,j)]=adj[IDX(j,i)]=sum;
01113                                                         }
01114                                                 }
01115 
01116                                         }
01117                                 }
01118                         }
01119                 } else
01120                 {
01122                         for(int k=0;k<n;++k)
01123                         {
01124                                 for(j=0;j<n;++j)
01125                                 {
01126                                         for(i=j+1;i<n;++i)
01127                                         {
01128                                                 const unsigned  sum=adj[IDX(i,k)]+adj[IDX(k,j)];
01129                                                 if(adj[IDX(i,j)]>sum)
01130                                                 {
01131                                                         adj[IDX(i,j)]=adj[IDX(j,i)]=sum;
01132                                                 }
01133                                         }
01134                                 }
01135                         }
01136                 }
01137 
01138 
01139                 /* Build links  */ 
01140                 int     nlinks=0;
01141                 for(j=0;j<n;++j)
01142                 {
01143                         for(i=j+1;i<n;++i)
01144                         {
01145                                 if(adj[IDX(i,j)]==(unsigned)distance)
01146                                 {
01147                                         appendLink(i,j,mat);
01148                                         m_links[m_links.size()-1].m_bbending=1;
01149                                         ++nlinks;
01150                                 }
01151                         }
01152                 }
01153                 delete[] adj;           
01154                 return(nlinks);
01155         }
01156         return(0);
01157 }
01158 
01159 //
01160 void                    btSoftBody::randomizeConstraints()
01161 {
01162         unsigned long   seed=243703;
01163 #define NEXTRAND (seed=(1664525L*seed+1013904223L)&0xffffffff)
01164         int i,ni;
01165 
01166         for(i=0,ni=m_links.size();i<ni;++i)
01167         {
01168                 btSwap(m_links[i],m_links[NEXTRAND%ni]);
01169         }
01170         for(i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
01171         {
01172                 btSwap(m_faces[i],m_faces[NEXTRAND%ni]);
01173         }
01174 #undef NEXTRAND
01175 }
01176 
01177 //
01178 void                    btSoftBody::releaseCluster(int index)
01179 {
01180         Cluster*        c=m_clusters[index];
01181         if(c->m_leaf) m_cdbvt.remove(c->m_leaf);
01182         c->~Cluster();
01183         btAlignedFree(c);
01184         m_clusters.remove(c);
01185 }
01186 
01187 //
01188 void                    btSoftBody::releaseClusters()
01189 {
01190         while(m_clusters.size()>0) releaseCluster(0);
01191 }
01192 
01193 //
01194 int                             btSoftBody::generateClusters(int k,int maxiterations)
01195 {
01196         int i;
01197         releaseClusters();
01198         m_clusters.resize(btMin(k,m_nodes.size()));
01199         for(i=0;i<m_clusters.size();++i)
01200         {
01201                 m_clusters[i]                   =       new(btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(Cluster),16)) Cluster();
01202                 m_clusters[i]->m_collide=       true;
01203         }
01204         k=m_clusters.size();
01205         if(k>0)
01206         {
01207                 /* Initialize           */ 
01208                 btAlignedObjectArray<btVector3> centers;
01209                 btVector3                                               cog(0,0,0);
01210                 int                                                             i;
01211                 for(i=0;i<m_nodes.size();++i)
01212                 {
01213                         cog+=m_nodes[i].m_x;
01214                         m_clusters[(i*29873)%m_clusters.size()]->m_nodes.push_back(&m_nodes[i]);
01215                 }
01216                 cog/=(btScalar)m_nodes.size();
01217                 centers.resize(k,cog);
01218                 /* Iterate                      */ 
01219                 const btScalar  slope=16;
01220                 bool                    changed;
01221                 int                             iterations=0;
01222                 do      {
01223                         const btScalar  w=2-btMin<btScalar>(1,iterations/slope);
01224                         changed=false;
01225                         iterations++;   
01226                         int i;
01227 
01228                         for(i=0;i<k;++i)
01229                         {
01230                                 btVector3       c(0,0,0);
01231                                 for(int j=0;j<m_clusters[i]->m_nodes.size();++j)
01232                                 {
01233                                         c+=m_clusters[i]->m_nodes[j]->m_x;
01234                                 }
01235                                 if(m_clusters[i]->m_nodes.size())
01236                                 {
01237                                         c                       /=      (btScalar)m_clusters[i]->m_nodes.size();
01238                                         c                       =       centers[i]+(c-centers[i])*w;
01239                                         changed         |=      ((c-centers[i]).length2()>SIMD_EPSILON);
01240                                         centers[i]      =       c;
01241                                         m_clusters[i]->m_nodes.resize(0);
01242                                 }                       
01243                         }
01244                         for(i=0;i<m_nodes.size();++i)
01245                         {
01246                                 const btVector3 nx=m_nodes[i].m_x;
01247                                 int                             kbest=0;
01248                                 btScalar                kdist=ClusterMetric(centers[0],nx);
01249                                 for(int j=1;j<k;++j)
01250                                 {
01251                                         const btScalar  d=ClusterMetric(centers[j],nx);
01252                                         if(d<kdist)
01253                                         {
01254                                                 kbest=j;
01255                                                 kdist=d;
01256                                         }
01257                                 }
01258                                 m_clusters[kbest]->m_nodes.push_back(&m_nodes[i]);
01259                         }               
01260                 } while(changed&&(iterations<maxiterations));
01261                 /* Merge                */ 
01262                 btAlignedObjectArray<int>       cids;
01263                 cids.resize(m_nodes.size(),-1);
01264                 for(i=0;i<m_clusters.size();++i)
01265                 {
01266                         for(int j=0;j<m_clusters[i]->m_nodes.size();++j)
01267                         {
01268                                 cids[int(m_clusters[i]->m_nodes[j]-&m_nodes[0])]=i;
01269                         }
01270                 }
01271                 for(i=0;i<m_faces.size();++i)
01272                 {
01273                         const int idx[]={       int(m_faces[i].m_n[0]-&m_nodes[0]),
01274                                 int(m_faces[i].m_n[1]-&m_nodes[0]),
01275                                 int(m_faces[i].m_n[2]-&m_nodes[0])};
01276                         for(int j=0;j<3;++j)
01277                         {
01278                                 const int cid=cids[idx[j]];
01279                                 for(int q=1;q<3;++q)
01280                                 {
01281                                         const int kid=idx[(j+q)%3];
01282                                         if(cids[kid]!=cid)
01283                                         {
01284                                                 if(m_clusters[cid]->m_nodes.findLinearSearch(&m_nodes[kid])==m_clusters[cid]->m_nodes.size())
01285                                                 {
01286                                                         m_clusters[cid]->m_nodes.push_back(&m_nodes[kid]);
01287                                                 }
01288                                         }
01289                                 }
01290                         }
01291                 }
01292                 /* Master               */ 
01293                 if(m_clusters.size()>1)
01294                 {
01295                         Cluster*        pmaster=new(btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(Cluster),16)) Cluster();
01296                         pmaster->m_collide      =       false;
01297                         pmaster->m_nodes.reserve(m_nodes.size());
01298                         for(int i=0;i<m_nodes.size();++i) pmaster->m_nodes.push_back(&m_nodes[i]);
01299                         m_clusters.push_back(pmaster);
01300                         btSwap(m_clusters[0],m_clusters[m_clusters.size()-1]);
01301                 }
01302                 /* Terminate    */ 
01303                 for(i=0;i<m_clusters.size();++i)
01304                 {
01305                         if(m_clusters[i]->m_nodes.size()==0)
01306                         {
01307                                 releaseCluster(i--);
01308                         }
01309                 }
01310         } else
01311         {
01312                 //create a cluster for each tetrahedron (if tetrahedra exist) or each face
01313                 if (m_tetras.size())
01314                 {
01315                         m_clusters.resize(m_tetras.size());
01316                         for(i=0;i<m_clusters.size();++i)
01317                         {
01318                                 m_clusters[i]                   =       new(btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(Cluster),16)) Cluster();
01319                                 m_clusters[i]->m_collide=       true;
01320                         }
01321                         for (i=0;i<m_tetras.size();i++)
01322                         {
01323                                 for (int j=0;j<4;j++)
01324                                 {
01325                                         m_clusters[i]->m_nodes.push_back(m_tetras[i].m_n[j]);
01326                                 }
01327                         }
01328 
01329                 } else
01330                 {
01331                         m_clusters.resize(m_faces.size());
01332                         for(i=0;i<m_clusters.size();++i)
01333                         {
01334                                 m_clusters[i]                   =       new(btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(Cluster),16)) Cluster();
01335                                 m_clusters[i]->m_collide=       true;
01336                         }
01337 
01338                         for(i=0;i<m_faces.size();++i)
01339                         {
01340                                 for(int j=0;j<3;++j)
01341                                 {
01342                                         m_clusters[i]->m_nodes.push_back(m_faces[i].m_n[j]);
01343                                 }
01344                         }
01345                 }
01346         }
01347 
01348         if (m_clusters.size())
01349         {
01350                 initializeClusters();
01351                 updateClusters();
01352 
01353 
01354                 //for self-collision
01355                 m_clusterConnectivity.resize(m_clusters.size()*m_clusters.size());
01356                 {
01357                         for (int c0=0;c0<m_clusters.size();c0++)
01358                         {
01359                                 m_clusters[c0]->m_clusterIndex=c0;
01360                                 for (int c1=0;c1<m_clusters.size();c1++)
01361                                 {
01362                                         
01363                                         bool connected=false;
01364                                         Cluster* cla = m_clusters[c0];
01365                                         Cluster* clb = m_clusters[c1];
01366                                         for (int i=0;!connected&&i<cla->m_nodes.size();i++)
01367                                         {
01368                                                 for (int j=0;j<clb->m_nodes.size();j++)
01369                                                 {
01370                                                         if (cla->m_nodes[i] == clb->m_nodes[j])
01371                                                         {
01372                                                                 connected=true;
01373                                                                 break;
01374                                                         }
01375                                                 }
01376                                         }
01377                                         m_clusterConnectivity[c0+c1*m_clusters.size()]=connected;
01378                                 }
01379                         }
01380                 }
01381         }
01382 
01383         return(m_clusters.size());
01384 }
01385 
01386 //
01387 void                    btSoftBody::refine(ImplicitFn* ifn,btScalar accurary,bool cut)
01388 {
01389         const Node*                     nbase = &m_nodes[0];
01390         int                                     ncount = m_nodes.size();
01391         btSymMatrix<int>        edges(ncount,-2);
01392         int                                     newnodes=0;
01393         int i,j,k,ni;
01394 
01395         /* Filter out           */ 
01396         for(i=0;i<m_links.size();++i)
01397         {
01398                 Link&   l=m_links[i];
01399                 if(l.m_bbending)
01400                 {
01401                         if(!SameSign(ifn->Eval(l.m_n[0]->m_x),ifn->Eval(l.m_n[1]->m_x)))
01402                         {
01403                                 btSwap(m_links[i],m_links[m_links.size()-1]);
01404                                 m_links.pop_back();--i;
01405                         }
01406                 }       
01407         }
01408         /* Fill edges           */ 
01409         for(i=0;i<m_links.size();++i)
01410         {
01411                 Link&   l=m_links[i];
01412                 edges(int(l.m_n[0]-nbase),int(l.m_n[1]-nbase))=-1;
01413         }
01414         for(i=0;i<m_faces.size();++i)
01415         {       
01416                 Face&   f=m_faces[i];
01417                 edges(int(f.m_n[0]-nbase),int(f.m_n[1]-nbase))=-1;
01418                 edges(int(f.m_n[1]-nbase),int(f.m_n[2]-nbase))=-1;
01419                 edges(int(f.m_n[2]-nbase),int(f.m_n[0]-nbase))=-1;
01420         }
01421         /* Intersect            */ 
01422         for(i=0;i<ncount;++i)
01423         {
01424                 for(j=i+1;j<ncount;++j)
01425                 {
01426                         if(edges(i,j)==-1)
01427                         {
01428                                 Node&                   a=m_nodes[i];
01429                                 Node&                   b=m_nodes[j];
01430                                 const btScalar  t=ImplicitSolve(ifn,a.m_x,b.m_x,accurary);
01431                                 if(t>0)
01432                                 {
01433                                         const btVector3 x=Lerp(a.m_x,b.m_x,t);
01434                                         const btVector3 v=Lerp(a.m_v,b.m_v,t);
01435                                         btScalar                m=0;
01436                                         if(a.m_im>0)
01437                                         {
01438                                                 if(b.m_im>0)
01439                                                 {
01440                                                         const btScalar  ma=1/a.m_im;
01441                                                         const btScalar  mb=1/b.m_im;
01442                                                         const btScalar  mc=Lerp(ma,mb,t);
01443                                                         const btScalar  f=(ma+mb)/(ma+mb+mc);
01444                                                         a.m_im=1/(ma*f);
01445                                                         b.m_im=1/(mb*f);
01446                                                         m=mc*f;
01447                                                 }
01448                                                 else
01449                                                 { a.m_im/=0.5f;m=1/a.m_im; }
01450                                         }
01451                                         else
01452                                         {
01453                                                 if(b.m_im>0)
01454                                                 { b.m_im/=0.5f;m=1/b.m_im; }
01455                                                 else
01456                                                         m=0;
01457                                         }
01458                                         appendNode(x,m);
01459                                         edges(i,j)=m_nodes.size()-1;
01460                                         m_nodes[edges(i,j)].m_v=v;
01461                                         ++newnodes;
01462                                 }
01463                         }
01464                 }
01465         }
01466         nbase=&m_nodes[0];
01467         /* Refine links         */ 
01468         for(i=0,ni=m_links.size();i<ni;++i)
01469         {
01470                 Link&           feat=m_links[i];
01471                 const int       idx[]={ int(feat.m_n[0]-nbase),
01472                         int(feat.m_n[1]-nbase)};
01473                 if((idx[0]<ncount)&&(idx[1]<ncount))
01474                 {
01475                         const int ni=edges(idx[0],idx[1]);
01476                         if(ni>0)
01477                         {
01478                                 appendLink(i);
01479                                 Link*           pft[]={ &m_links[i],
01480                                         &m_links[m_links.size()-1]};                    
01481                                 pft[0]->m_n[0]=&m_nodes[idx[0]];
01482                                 pft[0]->m_n[1]=&m_nodes[ni];
01483                                 pft[1]->m_n[0]=&m_nodes[ni];
01484                                 pft[1]->m_n[1]=&m_nodes[idx[1]];
01485                         }
01486                 }
01487         }
01488         /* Refine faces         */ 
01489         for(i=0;i<m_faces.size();++i)
01490         {
01491                 const Face&     feat=m_faces[i];
01492                 const int       idx[]={ int(feat.m_n[0]-nbase),
01493                         int(feat.m_n[1]-nbase),
01494                         int(feat.m_n[2]-nbase)};
01495                 for(j=2,k=0;k<3;j=k++)
01496                 {
01497                         if((idx[j]<ncount)&&(idx[k]<ncount))
01498                         {
01499                                 const int ni=edges(idx[j],idx[k]);
01500                                 if(ni>0)
01501                                 {
01502                                         appendFace(i);
01503                                         const int       l=(k+1)%3;
01504                                         Face*           pft[]={ &m_faces[i],
01505                                                 &m_faces[m_faces.size()-1]};
01506                                         pft[0]->m_n[0]=&m_nodes[idx[l]];
01507                                         pft[0]->m_n[1]=&m_nodes[idx[j]];
01508                                         pft[0]->m_n[2]=&m_nodes[ni];
01509                                         pft[1]->m_n[0]=&m_nodes[ni];
01510                                         pft[1]->m_n[1]=&m_nodes[idx[k]];
01511                                         pft[1]->m_n[2]=&m_nodes[idx[l]];
01512                                         appendLink(ni,idx[l],pft[0]->m_material);
01513                                         --i;break;
01514                                 }
01515                         }
01516                 }
01517         }
01518         /* Cut                          */ 
01519         if(cut)
01520         {       
01521                 btAlignedObjectArray<int>       cnodes;
01522                 const int                                       pcount=ncount;
01523                 int                                                     i;
01524                 ncount=m_nodes.size();
01525                 cnodes.resize(ncount,0);
01526                 /* Nodes                */ 
01527                 for(i=0;i<ncount;++i)
01528                 {
01529                         const btVector3 x=m_nodes[i].m_x;
01530                         if((i>=pcount)||(btFabs(ifn->Eval(x))<accurary))
01531                         {
01532                                 const btVector3 v=m_nodes[i].m_v;
01533                                 btScalar                m=getMass(i);
01534                                 if(m>0) { m*=0.5f;m_nodes[i].m_im/=0.5f; }
01535                                 appendNode(x,m);
01536                                 cnodes[i]=m_nodes.size()-1;
01537                                 m_nodes[cnodes[i]].m_v=v;
01538                         }
01539                 }
01540                 nbase=&m_nodes[0];
01541                 /* Links                */ 
01542                 for(i=0,ni=m_links.size();i<ni;++i)
01543                 {
01544                         const int               id[]={  int(m_links[i].m_n[0]-nbase),
01545                                 int(m_links[i].m_n[1]-nbase)};
01546                         int                             todetach=0;
01547                         if(cnodes[id[0]]&&cnodes[id[1]])
01548                         {
01549                                 appendLink(i);
01550                                 todetach=m_links.size()-1;
01551                         }
01552                         else
01553                         {
01554                                 if((    (ifn->Eval(m_nodes[id[0]].m_x)<accurary)&&
01555                                         (ifn->Eval(m_nodes[id[1]].m_x)<accurary)))
01556                                         todetach=i;
01557                         }
01558                         if(todetach)
01559                         {
01560                                 Link&   l=m_links[todetach];
01561                                 for(int j=0;j<2;++j)
01562                                 {
01563                                         int cn=cnodes[int(l.m_n[j]-nbase)];
01564                                         if(cn) l.m_n[j]=&m_nodes[cn];
01565                                 }                       
01566                         }
01567                 }
01568                 /* Faces                */ 
01569                 for(i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
01570                 {
01571                         Node**                  n=      m_faces[i].m_n;
01572                         if(     (ifn->Eval(n[0]->m_x)<accurary)&&
01573                                 (ifn->Eval(n[1]->m_x)<accurary)&&
01574                                 (ifn->Eval(n[2]->m_x)<accurary))
01575                         {
01576                                 for(int j=0;j<3;++j)
01577                                 {
01578                                         int cn=cnodes[int(n[j]-nbase)];
01579                                         if(cn) n[j]=&m_nodes[cn];
01580                                 }
01581                         }
01582                 }
01583                 /* Clean orphans        */ 
01584                 int                                                     nnodes=m_nodes.size();
01585                 btAlignedObjectArray<int>       ranks;
01586                 btAlignedObjectArray<int>       todelete;
01587                 ranks.resize(nnodes,0);
01588                 for(i=0,ni=m_links.size();i<ni;++i)
01589                 {
01590                         for(int j=0;j<2;++j) ranks[int(m_links[i].m_n[j]-nbase)]++;
01591                 }
01592                 for(i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
01593                 {
01594                         for(int j=0;j<3;++j) ranks[int(m_faces[i].m_n[j]-nbase)]++;
01595                 }
01596                 for(i=0;i<m_links.size();++i)
01597                 {
01598                         const int       id[]={  int(m_links[i].m_n[0]-nbase),
01599                                 int(m_links[i].m_n[1]-nbase)};
01600                         const bool      sg[]={  ranks[id[0]]==1,
01601                                 ranks[id[1]]==1};
01602                         if(sg[0]||sg[1])
01603                         {
01604                                 --ranks[id[0]];
01605                                 --ranks[id[1]];
01606                                 btSwap(m_links[i],m_links[m_links.size()-1]);
01607                                 m_links.pop_back();--i;
01608                         }
01609                 }
01610 #if 0   
01611                 for(i=nnodes-1;i>=0;--i)
01612                 {
01613                         if(!ranks[i]) todelete.push_back(i);
01614                 }       
01615                 if(todelete.size())
01616                 {               
01617                         btAlignedObjectArray<int>&      map=ranks;
01618                         for(int i=0;i<nnodes;++i) map[i]=i;
01619                         PointersToIndices(this);
01620                         for(int i=0,ni=todelete.size();i<ni;++i)
01621                         {
01622                                 int             j=todelete[i];
01623                                 int&    a=map[j];
01624                                 int&    b=map[--nnodes];
01625                                 m_ndbvt.remove(m_nodes[a].m_leaf);m_nodes[a].m_leaf=0;
01626                                 btSwap(m_nodes[a],m_nodes[b]);
01627                                 j=a;a=b;b=j;                    
01628                         }
01629                         IndicesToPointers(this,&map[0]);
01630                         m_nodes.resize(nnodes);
01631                 }
01632 #endif
01633         }
01634         m_bUpdateRtCst=true;
01635 }
01636 
01637 //
01638 bool                    btSoftBody::cutLink(const Node* node0,const Node* node1,btScalar position)
01639 {
01640         return(cutLink(int(node0-&m_nodes[0]),int(node1-&m_nodes[0]),position));
01641 }
01642 
01643 //
01644 bool                    btSoftBody::cutLink(int node0,int node1,btScalar position)
01645 {
01646         bool                    done=false;
01647         int i,ni;
01648 //      const btVector3 d=m_nodes[node0].m_x-m_nodes[node1].m_x;
01649         const btVector3 x=Lerp(m_nodes[node0].m_x,m_nodes[node1].m_x,position);
01650         const btVector3 v=Lerp(m_nodes[node0].m_v,m_nodes[node1].m_v,position);
01651         const btScalar  m=1;
01652         appendNode(x,m);
01653         appendNode(x,m);
01654         Node*                   pa=&m_nodes[node0];
01655         Node*                   pb=&m_nodes[node1];
01656         Node*                   pn[2]={ &m_nodes[m_nodes.size()-2],
01657                 &m_nodes[m_nodes.size()-1]};
01658         pn[0]->m_v=v;
01659         pn[1]->m_v=v;
01660         for(i=0,ni=m_links.size();i<ni;++i)
01661         {
01662                 const int mtch=MatchEdge(m_links[i].m_n[0],m_links[i].m_n[1],pa,pb);
01663                 if(mtch!=-1)
01664                 {
01665                         appendLink(i);
01666                         Link*   pft[]={&m_links[i],&m_links[m_links.size()-1]};
01667                         pft[0]->m_n[1]=pn[mtch];
01668                         pft[1]->m_n[0]=pn[1-mtch];
01669                         done=true;
01670                 }
01671         }
01672         for(i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
01673         {
01674                 for(int k=2,l=0;l<3;k=l++)
01675                 {
01676                         const int mtch=MatchEdge(m_faces[i].m_n[k],m_faces[i].m_n[l],pa,pb);
01677                         if(mtch!=-1)
01678                         {
01679                                 appendFace(i);
01680                                 Face*   pft[]={&m_faces[i],&m_faces[m_faces.size()-1]};
01681                                 pft[0]->m_n[l]=pn[mtch];
01682                                 pft[1]->m_n[k]=pn[1-mtch];
01683                                 appendLink(pn[0],pft[0]->m_n[(l+1)%3],pft[0]->m_material,true);
01684                                 appendLink(pn[1],pft[0]->m_n[(l+1)%3],pft[0]->m_material,true);
01685                         }
01686                 }
01687         }
01688         if(!done)
01689         {
01690                 m_ndbvt.remove(pn[0]->m_leaf);
01691                 m_ndbvt.remove(pn[1]->m_leaf);
01692                 m_nodes.pop_back();
01693                 m_nodes.pop_back();
01694         }
01695         return(done);
01696 }
01697 
01698 //
01699 bool                    btSoftBody::rayTest(const btVector3& rayFrom,
01700                                                                         const btVector3& rayTo,
01701                                                                         sRayCast& results)
01702 {
01703         if(m_faces.size()&&m_fdbvt.empty()) 
01704                 initializeFaceTree();
01705 
01706         results.body    =       this;
01707         results.fraction = 1.f;
01708         results.feature =       eFeature::None;
01709         results.index   =       -1;
01710 
01711         return(rayTest(rayFrom,rayTo,results.fraction,results.feature,results.index,false)!=0);
01712 }
01713 
01714 //
01715 void                    btSoftBody::setSolver(eSolverPresets::_ preset)
01716 {
01717         m_cfg.m_vsequence.clear();
01718         m_cfg.m_psequence.clear();
01719         m_cfg.m_dsequence.clear();
01720         switch(preset)
01721         {
01722         case    eSolverPresets::Positions:
01723                 m_cfg.m_psequence.push_back(ePSolver::Anchors);
01724                 m_cfg.m_psequence.push_back(ePSolver::RContacts);
01725                 m_cfg.m_psequence.push_back(ePSolver::SContacts);
01726                 m_cfg.m_psequence.push_back(ePSolver::Linear);  
01727                 break;  
01728         case    eSolverPresets::Velocities:
01729                 m_cfg.m_vsequence.push_back(eVSolver::Linear);
01730 
01731                 m_cfg.m_psequence.push_back(ePSolver::Anchors);
01732                 m_cfg.m_psequence.push_back(ePSolver::RContacts);
01733                 m_cfg.m_psequence.push_back(ePSolver::SContacts);
01734 
01735                 m_cfg.m_dsequence.push_back(ePSolver::Linear);
01736                 break;
01737         }
01738 }
01739 
01740 //
01741 void                    btSoftBody::predictMotion(btScalar dt)
01742 {
01743 
01744         int i,ni;
01745 
01746         /* Update                               */ 
01747         if(m_bUpdateRtCst)
01748         {
01749                 m_bUpdateRtCst=false;
01750                 updateConstants();
01751                 m_fdbvt.clear();
01752                 if(m_cfg.collisions&fCollision::VF_SS)
01753                 {
01754                         initializeFaceTree();                   
01755                 }
01756         }
01757 
01758         /* Prepare                              */ 
01759         m_sst.sdt               =       dt*m_cfg.timescale;
01760         m_sst.isdt              =       1/m_sst.sdt;
01761         m_sst.velmrg    =       m_sst.sdt*3;
01762         m_sst.radmrg    =       getCollisionShape()->getMargin();
01763         m_sst.updmrg    =       m_sst.radmrg*(btScalar)0.25;
01764         /* Forces                               */ 
01765         addVelocity(m_worldInfo->m_gravity*m_sst.sdt);
01766         applyForces();
01767         /* Integrate                    */ 
01768         for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
01769         {
01770                 Node&   n=m_nodes[i];
01771                 n.m_q   =       n.m_x;
01772                 btVector3 deltaV = n.m_f*n.m_im*m_sst.sdt;
01773                 {
01774                         btScalar maxDisplacement = m_worldInfo->m_maxDisplacement;
01775                         btScalar clampDeltaV = maxDisplacement/m_sst.sdt;
01776                         for (int c=0;c<3;c++)
01777                         {
01778                                 if (deltaV[c]>clampDeltaV)
01779                                 {
01780                                         deltaV[c] = clampDeltaV;
01781                                 }
01782                                 if (deltaV[c]<-clampDeltaV)
01783                                 {
01784                                         deltaV[c]=-clampDeltaV;
01785                                 }
01786                         }
01787                 }
01788                 n.m_v   +=      deltaV;
01789                 n.m_x   +=      n.m_v*m_sst.sdt;
01790                 n.m_f   =       btVector3(0,0,0);
01791         }
01792         /* Clusters                             */ 
01793         updateClusters();
01794         /* Bounds                               */ 
01795         updateBounds(); 
01796         /* Nodes                                */ 
01797         ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(btDbvtVolume)       vol;
01798         for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
01799         {
01800                 Node&   n=m_nodes[i];
01801                 vol = btDbvtVolume::FromCR(n.m_x,m_sst.radmrg);
01802                 m_ndbvt.update( n.m_leaf,
01803                         vol,
01804                         n.m_v*m_sst.velmrg,
01805                         m_sst.updmrg);
01806         }
01807         /* Faces                                */ 
01808         if(!m_fdbvt.empty())
01809         {
01810                 for(int i=0;i<m_faces.size();++i)
01811                 {
01812                         Face&                   f=m_faces[i];
01813                         const btVector3 v=(     f.m_n[0]->m_v+
01814                                 f.m_n[1]->m_v+
01815                                 f.m_n[2]->m_v)/3;
01816                         vol = VolumeOf(f,m_sst.radmrg);
01817                         m_fdbvt.update( f.m_leaf,
01818                                 vol,
01819                                 v*m_sst.velmrg,
01820                                 m_sst.updmrg);
01821                 }
01822         }
01823         /* Pose                                 */ 
01824         updatePose();
01825         /* Match                                */ 
01826         if(m_pose.m_bframe&&(m_cfg.kMT>0))
01827         {
01828                 const btMatrix3x3       posetrs=m_pose.m_rot;
01829                 for(int i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
01830                 {
01831                         Node&   n=m_nodes[i];
01832                         if(n.m_im>0)
01833                         {
01834                                 const btVector3 x=posetrs*m_pose.m_pos[i]+m_pose.m_com;
01835                                 n.m_x=Lerp(n.m_x,x,m_cfg.kMT);
01836                         }
01837                 }
01838         }
01839         /* Clear contacts               */ 
01840         m_rcontacts.resize(0);
01841         m_scontacts.resize(0);
01842         /* Optimize dbvt's              */ 
01843         m_ndbvt.optimizeIncremental(1);
01844         m_fdbvt.optimizeIncremental(1);
01845         m_cdbvt.optimizeIncremental(1);
01846 }
01847 
01848 //
01849 void                    btSoftBody::solveConstraints()
01850 {
01851 
01852         /* Apply clusters               */ 
01853         applyClusters(false);
01854         /* Prepare links                */ 
01855 
01856         int i,ni;
01857 
01858         for(i=0,ni=m_links.size();i<ni;++i)
01859         {
01860                 Link&   l=m_links[i];
01861                 l.m_c3          =       l.m_n[1]->m_q-l.m_n[0]->m_q;
01862                 l.m_c2          =       1/(l.m_c3.length2()*l.m_c0);
01863         }
01864         /* Prepare anchors              */ 
01865         for(i=0,ni=m_anchors.size();i<ni;++i)
01866         {
01867                 Anchor&                 a=m_anchors[i];
01868                 const btVector3 ra=a.m_body->getWorldTransform().getBasis()*a.m_local;
