01869                 a.m_c0  =       ImpulseMatrix(  m_sst.sdt,
01870                         a.m_node->m_im,
01871                         a.m_body->getInvMass(),
01872                         a.m_body->getInvInertiaTensorWorld(),
01873                         ra);
01874                 a.m_c1  =       ra;
01875                 a.m_c2  =       m_sst.sdt*a.m_node->m_im;
01876                 a.m_body->activate();
01877         }
01878         /* Solve velocities             */ 
01879         if(m_cfg.viterations>0)
01880         {
01881                 /* Solve                        */ 
01882                 for(int isolve=0;isolve<m_cfg.viterations;++isolve)
01883                 {
01884                         for(int iseq=0;iseq<m_cfg.m_vsequence.size();++iseq)
01885                         {
01886                                 getSolver(m_cfg.m_vsequence[iseq])(this,1);
01887                         }
01888                 }
01889                 /* Update                       */ 
01890                 for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
01891                 {
01892                         Node&   n=m_nodes[i];
01893                         n.m_x   =       n.m_q+n.m_v*m_sst.sdt;
01894                 }
01895         }
01896         /* Solve positions              */ 
01897         if(m_cfg.piterations>0)
01898         {
01899                 for(int isolve=0;isolve<m_cfg.piterations;++isolve)
01900                 {
01901                         const btScalar ti=isolve/(btScalar)m_cfg.piterations;
01902                         for(int iseq=0;iseq<m_cfg.m_psequence.size();++iseq)
01903                         {
01904                                 getSolver(m_cfg.m_psequence[iseq])(this,1,ti);
01905                         }
01906                 }
01907                 const btScalar  vc=m_sst.isdt*(1-m_cfg.kDP);
01908                 for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
01909                 {
01910                         Node&   n=m_nodes[i];
01911                         n.m_v   =       (n.m_x-n.m_q)*vc;
01912                         n.m_f   =       btVector3(0,0,0);               
01913                 }
01914         }
01915         /* Solve drift                  */ 
01916         if(m_cfg.diterations>0)
01917         {
01918                 const btScalar  vcf=m_cfg.kVCF*m_sst.isdt;
01919                 for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
01920                 {
01921                         Node&   n=m_nodes[i];
01922                         n.m_q   =       n.m_x;
01923                 }
01924                 for(int idrift=0;idrift<m_cfg.diterations;++idrift)
01925                 {
01926                         for(int iseq=0;iseq<m_cfg.m_dsequence.size();++iseq)
01927                         {
01928                                 getSolver(m_cfg.m_dsequence[iseq])(this,1,0);
01929                         }
01930                 }
01931                 for(int i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
01932                 {
01933                         Node&   n=m_nodes[i];
01934                         n.m_v   +=      (n.m_x-n.m_q)*vcf;
01935                 }
01936         }
01937         /* Apply clusters               */ 
01938         dampClusters();
01939         applyClusters(true);
01940 }
01941 
01942 //
01943 void                    btSoftBody::staticSolve(int iterations)
01944 {
01945         for(int isolve=0;isolve<iterations;++isolve)
01946         {
01947                 for(int iseq=0;iseq<m_cfg.m_psequence.size();++iseq)
01948                 {
01949                         getSolver(m_cfg.m_psequence[iseq])(this,1,0);
01950                 }
01951         }
01952 }
01953 
01954 //
01955 void                    btSoftBody::solveCommonConstraints(btSoftBody** /*bodies*/,int /*count*/,int /*iterations*/)
01956 {
01958 }
01959 
01960 //
01961 void                    btSoftBody::solveClusters(const btAlignedObjectArray<btSoftBody*>& bodies)
01962 {
01963         const int       nb=bodies.size();
01964         int                     iterations=0;
01965         int i;
01966 
01967         for(i=0;i<nb;++i)
01968         {
01969                 iterations=btMax(iterations,bodies[i]->m_cfg.citerations);
01970         }
01971         for(i=0;i<nb;++i)
01972         {
01973                 bodies[i]->prepareClusters(iterations);
01974         }
01975         for(i=0;i<iterations;++i)
01976         {
01977                 const btScalar sor=1;
01978                 for(int j=0;j<nb;++j)
01979                 {
01980                         bodies[j]->solveClusters(sor);
01981                 }
01982         }
01983         for(i=0;i<nb;++i)
01984         {
01985                 bodies[i]->cleanupClusters();
01986         }
01987 }
01988 
01989 //
01990 void                    btSoftBody::integrateMotion()
01991 {
01992         /* Update                       */ 
01993         updateNormals();
01994 }
01995 
01996 //
01997 btSoftBody::RayFromToCaster::RayFromToCaster(const btVector3& rayFrom,const btVector3& rayTo,btScalar mxt)
01998 {
01999         m_rayFrom = rayFrom;
02000         m_rayNormalizedDirection = (rayTo-rayFrom);
02001         m_rayTo = rayTo;
02002         m_mint  =       mxt;
02003         m_face  =       0;
02004         m_tests =       0;
02005 }
02006 
02007 //
02008 void                            btSoftBody::RayFromToCaster::Process(const btDbvtNode* leaf)
02009 {
02010         btSoftBody::Face&       f=*(btSoftBody::Face*)leaf->data;
02011         const btScalar          t=rayFromToTriangle(    m_rayFrom,m_rayTo,m_rayNormalizedDirection,
02012                 f.m_n[0]->m_x,
02013                 f.m_n[1]->m_x,
02014                 f.m_n[2]->m_x,
02015                 m_mint);
02016         if((t>0)&&(t<m_mint)) 
02017         { 
02018                 m_mint=t;m_face=&f; 
02019         }
02020         ++m_tests;
02021 }
02022 
02023 //
02024 btScalar                        btSoftBody::RayFromToCaster::rayFromToTriangle( const btVector3& rayFrom,
02025                                                                                                                                    const btVector3& rayTo,
02026                                                                                                                                    const btVector3& rayNormalizedDirection,
02027                                                                                                                                    const btVector3& a,
02028                                                                                                                                    const btVector3& b,
02029                                                                                                                                    const btVector3& c,
02030                                                                                                                                    btScalar maxt)
02031 {
02032         static const btScalar   ceps=-SIMD_EPSILON*10;
02033         static const btScalar   teps=SIMD_EPSILON*10;
02034 
02035         const btVector3                 n=btCross(b-a,c-a);
02036         const btScalar                  d=btDot(a,n);
02037         const btScalar                  den=btDot(rayNormalizedDirection,n);
02038         if(!btFuzzyZero(den))
02039         {
02040                 const btScalar          num=btDot(rayFrom,n)-d;
02041                 const btScalar          t=-num/den;
02042                 if((t>teps)&&(t<maxt))
02043                 {
02044                         const btVector3 hit=rayFrom+rayNormalizedDirection*t;
02045                         if(     (btDot(n,btCross(a-hit,b-hit))>ceps)    &&                      
02046                                 (btDot(n,btCross(b-hit,c-hit))>ceps)    &&
02047                                 (btDot(n,btCross(c-hit,a-hit))>ceps))
02048                         {
02049                                 return(t);
02050                         }
02051                 }
02052         }
02053         return(-1);
02054 }
02055 
02056 //
02057 void                            btSoftBody::pointersToIndices()
02058 {
02059 #define PTR2IDX(_p_,_b_)        reinterpret_cast<btSoftBody::Node*>((_p_)-(_b_))
02060         btSoftBody::Node*       base=m_nodes.size() ? &m_nodes[0] : 0;
02061         int i,ni;
02062 
02063         for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
02064         {
02065                 if(m_nodes[i].m_leaf)
02066                 {
02067                         m_nodes[i].m_leaf->data=*(void**)&i;
02068                 }
02069         }
02070         for(i=0,ni=m_links.size();i<ni;++i)
02071         {
02072                 m_links[i].m_n[0]=PTR2IDX(m_links[i].m_n[0],base);
02073                 m_links[i].m_n[1]=PTR2IDX(m_links[i].m_n[1],base);
02074         }
02075         for(i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
02076         {
02077                 m_faces[i].m_n[0]=PTR2IDX(m_faces[i].m_n[0],base);
02078                 m_faces[i].m_n[1]=PTR2IDX(m_faces[i].m_n[1],base);
02079                 m_faces[i].m_n[2]=PTR2IDX(m_faces[i].m_n[2],base);
02080                 if(m_faces[i].m_leaf)
02081                 {
02082                         m_faces[i].m_leaf->data=*(void**)&i;
02083                 }
02084         }
02085         for(i=0,ni=m_anchors.size();i<ni;++i)
02086         {
02087                 m_anchors[i].m_node=PTR2IDX(m_anchors[i].m_node,base);
02088         }
02089         for(i=0,ni=m_notes.size();i<ni;++i)
02090         {
02091                 for(int j=0;j<m_notes[i].m_rank;++j)
02092                 {
02093                         m_notes[i].m_nodes[j]=PTR2IDX(m_notes[i].m_nodes[j],base);
02094                 }
02095         }
02096 #undef  PTR2IDX
02097 }
02098 
02099 //
02100 void                            btSoftBody::indicesToPointers(const int* map)
02101 {
02102 #define IDX2PTR(_p_,_b_)        map?(&(_b_)[map[(((char*)_p_)-(char*)0)]]):     \
02103         (&(_b_)[(((char*)_p_)-(char*)0)])
02104         btSoftBody::Node*       base=m_nodes.size() ? &m_nodes[0]:0;
02105         int i,ni;
02106 
02107         for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
02108         {
02109                 if(m_nodes[i].m_leaf)
02110                 {
02111                         m_nodes[i].m_leaf->data=&m_nodes[i];
02112                 }
02113         }
02114         for(i=0,ni=m_links.size();i<ni;++i)
02115         {
02116                 m_links[i].m_n[0]=IDX2PTR(m_links[i].m_n[0],base);
02117                 m_links[i].m_n[1]=IDX2PTR(m_links[i].m_n[1],base);
02118         }
02119         for(i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
02120         {
02121                 m_faces[i].m_n[0]=IDX2PTR(m_faces[i].m_n[0],base);
02122                 m_faces[i].m_n[1]=IDX2PTR(m_faces[i].m_n[1],base);
02123                 m_faces[i].m_n[2]=IDX2PTR(m_faces[i].m_n[2],base);
02124                 if(m_faces[i].m_leaf)
02125                 {
02126                         m_faces[i].m_leaf->data=&m_faces[i];
02127                 }
02128         }
02129         for(i=0,ni=m_anchors.size();i<ni;++i)
02130         {
02131                 m_anchors[i].m_node=IDX2PTR(m_anchors[i].m_node,base);
02132         }
02133         for(i=0,ni=m_notes.size();i<ni;++i)
02134         {
02135                 for(int j=0;j<m_notes[i].m_rank;++j)
02136                 {
02137                         m_notes[i].m_nodes[j]=IDX2PTR(m_notes[i].m_nodes[j],base);
02138                 }
02139         }
02140 #undef  IDX2PTR
02141 }
02142 
02143 //
02144 int                                     btSoftBody::rayTest(const btVector3& rayFrom,const btVector3& rayTo,
02145                                                                                 btScalar& mint,eFeature::_& feature,int& index,bool bcountonly) const
02146 {
02147         int     cnt=0;
02148         btVector3 dir = rayTo-rayFrom;
02149         
02150 
02151         if(bcountonly||m_fdbvt.empty())
02152         {/* Full search */ 
02153                 
02154                 for(int i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
02155                 {
02156                         const btSoftBody::Face& f=m_faces[i];
02157 
02158                         const btScalar                  t=RayFromToCaster::rayFromToTriangle(   rayFrom,rayTo,dir,
02159                                 f.m_n[0]->m_x,
02160                                 f.m_n[1]->m_x,
02161                                 f.m_n[2]->m_x,
02162                                 mint);
02163                         if(t>0)
02164                         {
02165                                 ++cnt;
02166                                 if(!bcountonly)
02167                                 {
02168                                         feature=btSoftBody::eFeature::Face;
02169                                         index=i;
02170                                         mint=t;
02171                                 }
02172                         }
02173                 }
02174         }
02175         else
02176         {/* Use dbvt    */ 
02177                 RayFromToCaster collider(rayFrom,rayTo,mint);
02178 
02179                 btDbvt::rayTest(m_fdbvt.m_root,rayFrom,rayTo,collider);
02180                 if(collider.m_face)
02181                 {
02182                         mint=collider.m_mint;
02183                         feature=btSoftBody::eFeature::Face;
02184                         index=(int)(collider.m_face-&m_faces[0]);
02185                         cnt=1;
02186                 }
02187         }
02188 
02189         for (int i=0;i<m_tetras.size();i++)
02190         {
02191                 const btSoftBody::Tetra& tet = m_tetras[i];
02192                 int tetfaces[4][3] = {{0,1,2},{0,1,3},{1,2,3},{0,2,3}};
02193                 for (int f=0;f<4;f++)
02194                 {
02195 
02196                         int index0=tetfaces[f][0];
02197                         int index1=tetfaces[f][1];
02198                         int index2=tetfaces[f][2];
02199                         btVector3 v0=tet.m_n[index0]->m_x;
02200                         btVector3 v1=tet.m_n[index1]->m_x;
02201                         btVector3 v2=tet.m_n[index2]->m_x;
02202 
02203 
02204                 const btScalar                  t=RayFromToCaster::rayFromToTriangle(   rayFrom,rayTo,dir,
02205                         v0,v1,v2,
02206                                 mint);
02207                 if(t>0)
02208                         {
02209                                 ++cnt;
02210                                 if(!bcountonly)
02211                                 {
02212                                         feature=btSoftBody::eFeature::Tetra;
02213                                         index=i;
02214                                         mint=t;
02215                                 }
02216                         }
02217                 }
02218         }
02219         return(cnt);
02220 }
02221 
02222 //
02223 void                    btSoftBody::initializeFaceTree()
02224 {
02225         m_fdbvt.clear();
02226         for(int i=0;i<m_faces.size();++i)
02227         {
02228                 Face&   f=m_faces[i];
02229                 f.m_leaf=m_fdbvt.insert(VolumeOf(f,0),&f);
02230         }
02231 }
02232 
02233 //
02234 btVector3               btSoftBody::evaluateCom() const
02235 {
02236         btVector3       com(0,0,0);
02237         if(m_pose.m_bframe)
02238         {
02239                 for(int i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
02240                 {
02241                         com+=m_nodes[i].m_x*m_pose.m_wgh[i];
02242                 }
02243         }
02244         return(com);
02245 }
02246 
02247 //
02248 bool                            btSoftBody::checkContact(       const btCollisionObjectWrapper* colObjWrap,
02249                                                                                          const btVector3& x,
02250                                                                                          btScalar margin,
02251                                                                                          btSoftBody::sCti& cti) const
02252 {
02253         btVector3 nrm;
02254         const btCollisionShape *shp = colObjWrap->getCollisionShape();
02255 //      const btRigidBody *tmpRigid = btRigidBody::upcast(colObjWrap->getCollisionObject());
02256         //const btTransform &wtr = tmpRigid ? tmpRigid->getWorldTransform() : colObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
02257         const btTransform &wtr = colObjWrap->getWorldTransform();
02258         //todo: check which transform is needed here
02259 
02260         btScalar dst = 
02261                 m_worldInfo->m_sparsesdf.Evaluate(      
02262                         wtr.invXform(x),
02263                         shp,
02264                         nrm,
02265                         margin);
02266         if(dst<0)
02267         {
02268                 cti.m_colObj = colObjWrap->getCollisionObject();
02269                 cti.m_normal = wtr.getBasis()*nrm;
02270                 cti.m_offset = -btDot( cti.m_normal, x - cti.m_normal * dst );
02271                 return(true);
02272         }
02273         return(false);
02274 }
02275 
02276 //
02277 void                                    btSoftBody::updateNormals()
02278 {
02279 
02280         const btVector3 zv(0,0,0);
02281         int i,ni;
02282 
02283         for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
02284         {
02285                 m_nodes[i].m_n=zv;
02286         }
02287         for(i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
02288         {
02289                 btSoftBody::Face&       f=m_faces[i];
02290                 const btVector3         n=btCross(f.m_n[1]->m_x-f.m_n[0]->m_x,
02291                         f.m_n[2]->m_x-f.m_n[0]->m_x);
02292                 f.m_normal=n.normalized();
02293                 f.m_n[0]->m_n+=n;
02294                 f.m_n[1]->m_n+=n;
02295                 f.m_n[2]->m_n+=n;
02296         }
02297         for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
02298         {
02299                 btScalar len = m_nodes[i].m_n.length();
02300                 if (len>SIMD_EPSILON)
02301                         m_nodes[i].m_n /= len;
02302         }
02303 }
02304 
02305 //
02306 void                                    btSoftBody::updateBounds()
02307 {
02308         /*if( m_acceleratedSoftBody )
02309         {
02310                 // If we have an accelerated softbody we need to obtain the bounds correctly
02311                 // For now (slightly hackily) just have a very large AABB
02312                 // TODO: Write get bounds kernel
02313                 // If that is updating in place, atomic collisions might be low (when the cloth isn't perfectly aligned to an axis) and we could
02314                 // probably do a test and exchange reasonably efficiently.
02315 
02316                 m_bounds[0] = btVector3(-1000, -1000, -1000);
02317                 m_bounds[1] = btVector3(1000, 1000, 1000);
02318 
02319         } else {*/
02320                 if(m_ndbvt.m_root)
02321                 {
02322                         const btVector3&        mins=m_ndbvt.m_root->volume.Mins();
02323                         const btVector3&        maxs=m_ndbvt.m_root->volume.Maxs();
02324                         const btScalar          csm=getCollisionShape()->getMargin();
02325                         const btVector3         mrg=btVector3(  csm,
02326                                 csm,
02327                                 csm)*1; // ??? to investigate...
02328                         m_bounds[0]=mins-mrg;
02329                         m_bounds[1]=maxs+mrg;
02330                         if(0!=getBroadphaseHandle())
02331                         {                                       
02332                                 m_worldInfo->m_broadphase->setAabb(     getBroadphaseHandle(),
02333                                         m_bounds[0],
02334                                         m_bounds[1],
02335                                         m_worldInfo->m_dispatcher);
02336                         }
02337                 }
02338                 else
02339                 {
02340                         m_bounds[0]=
02341                                 m_bounds[1]=btVector3(0,0,0);
02342                 }               
02343         //}
02344 }
02345 
02346 
02347 //
02348 void                                    btSoftBody::updatePose()
02349 {
02350         if(m_pose.m_bframe)
02351         {
02352                 btSoftBody::Pose&       pose=m_pose;
02353                 const btVector3         com=evaluateCom();
02354                 /* Com                  */ 
02355                 pose.m_com      =       com;
02356                 /* Rotation             */ 
02357                 btMatrix3x3             Apq;
02358                 const btScalar  eps=SIMD_EPSILON;
02359                 Apq[0]=Apq[1]=Apq[2]=btVector3(0,0,0);
02360                 Apq[0].setX(eps);Apq[1].setY(eps*2);Apq[2].setZ(eps*3);
02361                 for(int i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
02362                 {
02363                         const btVector3         a=pose.m_wgh[i]*(m_nodes[i].m_x-com);
02364                         const btVector3&        b=pose.m_pos[i];
02365                         Apq[0]+=a.x()*b;
02366                         Apq[1]+=a.y()*b;
02367                         Apq[2]+=a.z()*b;
02368                 }
02369                 btMatrix3x3             r,s;
02370                 PolarDecompose(Apq,r,s);
02371                 pose.m_rot=r;
02372                 pose.m_scl=pose.m_aqq*r.transpose()*Apq;
02373                 if(m_cfg.maxvolume>1)
02374                 {
02375                         const btScalar  idet=Clamp<btScalar>(   1/pose.m_scl.determinant(),
02376                                 1,m_cfg.maxvolume);
02377                         pose.m_scl=Mul(pose.m_scl,idet);
02378                 }
02379 
02380         }
02381 }
02382 
02383 //
02384 void                            btSoftBody::updateArea(bool averageArea)
02385 {
02386         int i,ni;
02387 
02388         /* Face area            */ 
02389         for(i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
02390         {
02391                 Face&           f=m_faces[i];
02392                 f.m_ra  =       AreaOf(f.m_n[0]->m_x,f.m_n[1]->m_x,f.m_n[2]->m_x);
02393         }
02394         
02395         /* Node area            */ 
02396 
02397         if (averageArea)
02398         {
02399                 btAlignedObjectArray<int>       counts;
02400                 counts.resize(m_nodes.size(),0);
02401                 for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
02402                 {
02403                         m_nodes[i].m_area       =       0;
02404                 }
02405                 for(i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
02406                 {
02407                         btSoftBody::Face&       f=m_faces[i];
02408                         for(int j=0;j<3;++j)
02409                         {
02410                                 const int index=(int)(f.m_n[j]-&m_nodes[0]);
02411                                 counts[index]++;
02412                                 f.m_n[j]->m_area+=btFabs(f.m_ra);
02413                         }
02414                 }
02415                 for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
02416                 {
02417                         if(counts[i]>0)
02418                                 m_nodes[i].m_area/=(btScalar)counts[i];
02419                         else
02420                                 m_nodes[i].m_area=0;
02421                 }
02422         }
02423         else
02424         {
02425                 // initialize node area as zero
02426                 for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
02427                 {
02428                         m_nodes[i].m_area=0;    
02429                 }
02430 
02431                 for(i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
02432                 {
02433                         btSoftBody::Face&       f=m_faces[i];
02434 
02435                         for(int j=0;j<3;++j)
02436                         {
02437                                 f.m_n[j]->m_area += f.m_ra;
02438                         }
02439                 }
02440 
02441                 for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
02442                 {
02443                         m_nodes[i].m_area *= 0.3333333f;
02444                 }
02445         }
02446 }
02447 
02448 
02449 void                            btSoftBody::updateLinkConstants()
02450 {       
02451         int i,ni;
02452 
02453         /* Links                */ 
02454         for(i=0,ni=m_links.size();i<ni;++i)
02455         {
02456                 Link&           l=m_links[i];
02457                 Material&       m=*l.m_material;
02458                 l.m_c0  =       (l.m_n[0]->m_im+l.m_n[1]->m_im)/m.m_kLST;
02459         }
02460 }
02461 
02462 void                            btSoftBody::updateConstants()
02463 {
02464         resetLinkRestLengths();
02465         updateLinkConstants();
02466         updateArea();
02467 }
02468 
02469 
02470 
02471 //
02472 void                                    btSoftBody::initializeClusters()
02473 {
02474         int i;
02475 
02476         for( i=0;i<m_clusters.size();++i)
02477         {
02478                 Cluster&        c=*m_clusters[i];
02479                 c.m_imass=0;
02480                 c.m_masses.resize(c.m_nodes.size());
02481                 for(int j=0;j<c.m_nodes.size();++j)
02482                 {
02483                         if (c.m_nodes[j]->m_im==0)
02484                         {
02485                                 c.m_containsAnchor = true;
02486                                 c.m_masses[j]   =       BT_LARGE_FLOAT;
02487                         } else
02488                         {
02489                                 c.m_masses[j]   =       btScalar(1.)/c.m_nodes[j]->m_im;
02490                         }
02491                         c.m_imass               +=      c.m_masses[j];
02492                 }
02493                 c.m_imass               =       btScalar(1.)/c.m_imass;
02494                 c.m_com                 =       btSoftBody::clusterCom(&c);
02495                 c.m_lv                  =       btVector3(0,0,0);
02496                 c.m_av                  =       btVector3(0,0,0);
02497                 c.m_leaf                =       0;
02498                 /* Inertia      */ 
02499                 btMatrix3x3&    ii=c.m_locii;
02500                 ii[0]=ii[1]=ii[2]=btVector3(0,0,0);
02501                 {
02502                         int i,ni;
02503 
02504                         for(i=0,ni=c.m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
02505                         {
02506                                 const btVector3 k=c.m_nodes[i]->m_x-c.m_com;
02507                                 const btVector3 q=k*k;
02508                                 const btScalar  m=c.m_masses[i];
02509                                 ii[0][0]        +=      m*(q[1]+q[2]);
02510                                 ii[1][1]        +=      m*(q[0]+q[2]);
02511                                 ii[2][2]        +=      m*(q[0]+q[1]);
02512                                 ii[0][1]        -=      m*k[0]*k[1];
02513                                 ii[0][2]        -=      m*k[0]*k[2];
02514                                 ii[1][2]        -=      m*k[1]*k[2];
02515                         }
02516                 }
02517                 ii[1][0]=ii[0][1];
02518                 ii[2][0]=ii[0][2];
02519                 ii[2][1]=ii[1][2];
02520                 
02521                 ii = ii.inverse();
02522 
02523                 /* Frame        */ 
02524                 c.m_framexform.setIdentity();
02525                 c.m_framexform.setOrigin(c.m_com);
02526                 c.m_framerefs.resize(c.m_nodes.size());
02527                 {
02528                         int i;
02529                         for(i=0;i<c.m_framerefs.size();++i)
02530                         {
02531                                 c.m_framerefs[i]=c.m_nodes[i]->m_x-c.m_com;
02532                         }
02533                 }
02534         }
02535 }
02536 
02537 //
02538 void                                    btSoftBody::updateClusters()
02539 {
02540         BT_PROFILE("UpdateClusters");
02541         int i;
02542 
02543         for(i=0;i<m_clusters.size();++i)
02544         {
02545                 btSoftBody::Cluster&    c=*m_clusters[i];
02546                 const int                               n=c.m_nodes.size();
02547                 //const btScalar                        invn=1/(btScalar)n;
02548                 if(n)
02549                 {
02550                         /* Frame                                */ 
02551                         const btScalar  eps=btScalar(0.0001);
02552                         btMatrix3x3             m,r,s;
02553                         m[0]=m[1]=m[2]=btVector3(0,0,0);
02554                         m[0][0]=eps*1;
02555                         m[1][1]=eps*2;
02556                         m[2][2]=eps*3;
02557                         c.m_com=clusterCom(&c);
02558                         for(int i=0;i<c.m_nodes.size();++i)
02559                         {
02560                                 const btVector3         a=c.m_nodes[i]->m_x-c.m_com;
02561                                 const btVector3&        b=c.m_framerefs[i];
02562                                 m[0]+=a[0]*b;m[1]+=a[1]*b;m[2]+=a[2]*b;
02563                         }
02564                         PolarDecompose(m,r,s);
02565                         c.m_framexform.setOrigin(c.m_com);
02566                         c.m_framexform.setBasis(r);             
02567                         /* Inertia                      */ 
02568 #if 1/* Constant        */ 
02569                         c.m_invwi=c.m_framexform.getBasis()*c.m_locii*c.m_framexform.getBasis().transpose();
02570 #else
02571 #if 0/* Sphere  */ 
02572                         const btScalar  rk=(2*c.m_extents.length2())/(5*c.m_imass);
02573                         const btVector3 inertia(rk,rk,rk);
02574                         const btVector3 iin(btFabs(inertia[0])>SIMD_EPSILON?1/inertia[0]:0,
02575                                 btFabs(inertia[1])>SIMD_EPSILON?1/inertia[1]:0,
02576                                 btFabs(inertia[2])>SIMD_EPSILON?1/inertia[2]:0);
02577 
02578                         c.m_invwi=c.m_xform.getBasis().scaled(iin)*c.m_xform.getBasis().transpose();
02579 #else/* Actual  */              
02580                         c.m_invwi[0]=c.m_invwi[1]=c.m_invwi[2]=btVector3(0,0,0);
02581                         for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
02582                         {
02583                                 const btVector3 k=c.m_nodes[i]->m_x-c.m_com;
02584                                 const btVector3         q=k*k;
02585                                 const btScalar          m=1/c.m_nodes[i]->m_im;
02586                                 c.m_invwi[0][0] +=      m*(q[1]+q[2]);
02587                                 c.m_invwi[1][1] +=      m*(q[0]+q[2]);
02588                                 c.m_invwi[2][2] +=      m*(q[0]+q[1]);
02589                                 c.m_invwi[0][1] -=      m*k[0]*k[1];
02590                                 c.m_invwi[0][2] -=      m*k[0]*k[2];
02591                                 c.m_invwi[1][2] -=      m*k[1]*k[2];
02592                         }
02593                         c.m_invwi[1][0]=c.m_invwi[0][1];
02594                         c.m_invwi[2][0]=c.m_invwi[0][2];
02595                         c.m_invwi[2][1]=c.m_invwi[1][2];
02596                         c.m_invwi=c.m_invwi.inverse();
02597 #endif
02598 #endif
02599                         /* Velocities                   */ 
02600                         c.m_lv=btVector3(0,0,0);
02601                         c.m_av=btVector3(0,0,0);
02602                         {
02603                                 int i;
02604 
02605                                 for(i=0;i<n;++i)
02606                                 {
02607                                         const btVector3 v=c.m_nodes[i]->m_v*c.m_masses[i];
02608                                         c.m_lv  +=      v;
02609                                         c.m_av  +=      btCross(c.m_nodes[i]->m_x-c.m_com,v);
02610                                 }
02611                         }
02612                         c.m_lv=c.m_imass*c.m_lv*(1-c.m_ldamping);
02613                         c.m_av=c.m_invwi*c.m_av*(1-c.m_adamping);
02614                         c.m_vimpulses[0]        =
02615                                 c.m_vimpulses[1]        = btVector3(0,0,0);
02616                         c.m_dimpulses[0]        =
02617                                 c.m_dimpulses[1]        = btVector3(0,0,0);
02618                         c.m_nvimpulses          = 0;
02619                         c.m_ndimpulses          = 0;
02620                         /* Matching                             */ 
02621                         if(c.m_matching>0)
02622                         {
02623                                 for(int j=0;j<c.m_nodes.size();++j)
02624                                 {
02625                                         Node&                   n=*c.m_nodes[j];
02626                                         const btVector3 x=c.m_framexform*c.m_framerefs[j];
02627                                         n.m_x=Lerp(n.m_x,x,c.m_matching);
02628                                 }
02629                         }                       
02630                         /* Dbvt                                 */ 
02631                         if(c.m_collide)
02632                         {
02633                                 btVector3       mi=c.m_nodes[0]->m_x;
02634                                 btVector3       mx=mi;
02635                                 for(int j=1;j<n;++j)
02636                                 {
02637                                         mi.setMin(c.m_nodes[j]->m_x);
02638                                         mx.setMax(c.m_nodes[j]->m_x);
02639                                 }                       
02640                                 ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(btDbvtVolume)       bounds=btDbvtVolume::FromMM(mi,mx);
02641                                 if(c.m_leaf)
02642                                         m_cdbvt.update(c.m_leaf,bounds,c.m_lv*m_sst.sdt*3,m_sst.radmrg);
02643                                 else
02644                                         c.m_leaf=m_cdbvt.insert(bounds,&c);
02645                         }
02646                 }
02647         }
02648 
02649 
02650 }
02651 
02652 
02653 
02654 
02655 //
02656 void                                    btSoftBody::cleanupClusters()
02657 {
02658         for(int i=0;i<m_joints.size();++i)
02659         {
02660                 m_joints[i]->Terminate(m_sst.sdt);
02661                 if(m_joints[i]->m_delete)
02662                 {
02663                         btAlignedFree(m_joints[i]);
02664                         m_joints.remove(m_joints[i--]);
02665                 }       
02666         }
02667 }
02668 
02669 //
02670 void                                    btSoftBody::prepareClusters(int iterations)
02671 {
02672         for(int i=0;i<m_joints.size();++i)
02673         {
02674                 m_joints[i]->Prepare(m_sst.sdt,iterations);
02675         }
02676 }
02677 
02678 
02679 //
02680 void                                    btSoftBody::solveClusters(btScalar sor)
02681 {
02682         for(int i=0,ni=m_joints.size();i<ni;++i)
02683         {
02684                 m_joints[i]->Solve(m_sst.sdt,sor);
02685         }
02686 }
02687 
02688 //
02689 void                                    btSoftBody::applyClusters(bool drift)
02690 {
02691         BT_PROFILE("ApplyClusters");
02692 //      const btScalar                                  f0=m_sst.sdt;
02693         //const btScalar                                        f1=f0/2;
02694         btAlignedObjectArray<btVector3> deltas;
02695         btAlignedObjectArray<btScalar> weights;
02696         deltas.resize(m_nodes.size(),btVector3(0,0,0));
02697         weights.resize(m_nodes.size(),0);
02698         int i;
02699 
02700         if(drift)
02701         {
02702                 for(i=0;i<m_clusters.size();++i)
02703                 {
02704                         Cluster&        c=*m_clusters[i];
02705                         if(c.m_ndimpulses)
02706                         {
02707                                 c.m_dimpulses[0]/=(btScalar)c.m_ndimpulses;
02708                                 c.m_dimpulses[1]/=(btScalar)c.m_ndimpulses;
02709                         }
02710                 }
02711         }
02712         
02713         for(i=0;i<m_clusters.size();++i)
02714         {
02715                 Cluster&        c=*m_clusters[i];       
02716                 if(0<(drift?c.m_ndimpulses:c.m_nvimpulses))
02717                 {
02718                         const btVector3         v=(drift?c.m_dimpulses[0]:c.m_vimpulses[0])*m_sst.sdt;
02719                         const btVector3         w=(drift?c.m_dimpulses[1]:c.m_vimpulses[1])*m_sst.sdt;
02720                         for(int j=0;j<c.m_nodes.size();++j)
02721                         {
02722                                 const int                       idx=int(c.m_nodes[j]-&m_nodes[0]);
02723                                 const btVector3&        x=c.m_nodes[j]->m_x;
02724                                 const btScalar          q=c.m_masses[j];
02725                                 deltas[idx]             +=      (v+btCross(w,x-c.m_com))*q;
02726                                 weights[idx]    +=      q;
02727                         }
02728                 }
02729         }
02730         for(i=0;i<deltas.size();++i)
02731         {
02732                 if(weights[i]>0) 
02733                 {
02734                         m_nodes[i].m_x+=deltas[i]/weights[i];
02735                 }
02736         }
02737 }
02738 
02739 //
02740 void                                    btSoftBody::dampClusters()
02741 {
02742         int i;
02743 
02744         for(i=0;i<m_clusters.size();++i)
02745         {
02746                 Cluster&        c=*m_clusters[i];       
02747                 if(c.m_ndamping>0)
02748                 {
02749                         for(int j=0;j<c.m_nodes.size();++j)
02750                         {
02751                                 Node&                   n=*c.m_nodes[j];
02752                                 if(n.m_im>0)
02753                                 {
02754                                         const btVector3 vx=c.m_lv+btCross(c.m_av,c.m_nodes[j]->m_q-c.m_com);
02755                                         if(vx.length2()<=n.m_v.length2())
02756                                                 {
02757                                                 n.m_v   +=      c.m_ndamping*(vx-n.m_v);
02758                                                 }
02759                                 }
02760                         }
02761                 }
02762         }
02763 }
02764 
02765 //
02766 void                            btSoftBody::Joint::Prepare(btScalar dt,int)
02767 {
02768         m_bodies[0].activate();
02769         m_bodies[1].activate();
02770 }
02771 
02772 //
02773 void                            btSoftBody::LJoint::Prepare(btScalar dt,int iterations)
02774 {
02775         static const btScalar   maxdrift=4;
02776         Joint::Prepare(dt,iterations);
02777         m_rpos[0]               =       m_bodies[0].xform()*m_refs[0];
02778         m_rpos[1]               =       m_bodies[1].xform()*m_refs[1];
02779         m_drift                 =       Clamp(m_rpos[0]-m_rpos[1],maxdrift)*m_erp/dt;
02780         m_rpos[0]               -=      m_bodies[0].xform().getOrigin();
02781         m_rpos[1]               -=      m_bodies[1].xform().getOrigin();
02782         m_massmatrix    =       ImpulseMatrix(  m_bodies[0].invMass(),m_bodies[0].invWorldInertia(),m_rpos[0],
02783                 m_bodies[1].invMass(),m_bodies[1].invWorldInertia(),m_rpos[1]);
02784         if(m_split>0)
02785         {
02786                 m_sdrift        =       m_massmatrix*(m_drift*m_split);
02787                 m_drift         *=      1-m_split;
02788         }
02789         m_drift /=(btScalar)iterations;
02790 }
02791 
02792 //
02793 void                            btSoftBody::LJoint::Solve(btScalar dt,btScalar sor)
02794 {
02795         const btVector3         va=m_bodies[0].velocity(m_rpos[0]);
02796         const btVector3         vb=m_bodies[1].velocity(m_rpos[1]);
02797         const btVector3         vr=va-vb;
02798         btSoftBody::Impulse     impulse;
02799         impulse.m_asVelocity    =       1;
02800         impulse.m_velocity              =       m_massmatrix*(m_drift+vr*m_cfm)*sor;
02801         m_bodies[0].applyImpulse(-impulse,m_rpos[0]);
02802         m_bodies[1].applyImpulse( impulse,m_rpos[1]);
02803 }
02804 
02805 //
02806 void                            btSoftBody::LJoint::Terminate(btScalar dt)
02807 {
02808         if(m_split>0)
02809         {
02810                 m_bodies[0].applyDImpulse(-m_sdrift,m_rpos[0]);
02811                 m_bodies[1].applyDImpulse( m_sdrift,m_rpos[1]);
02812         }
02813 }
02814 
02815 //
02816 void                            btSoftBody::AJoint::Prepare(btScalar dt,int iterations)
02817 {
02818         static const btScalar   maxdrift=SIMD_PI/16;
02819         m_icontrol->Prepare(this);
02820         Joint::Prepare(dt,iterations);
02821         m_axis[0]       =       m_bodies[0].xform().getBasis()*m_refs[0];
02822         m_axis[1]       =       m_bodies[1].xform().getBasis()*m_refs[1];
02823         m_drift         =       NormalizeAny(btCross(m_axis[1],m_axis[0]));
02824         m_drift         *=      btMin(maxdrift,btAcos(Clamp<btScalar>(btDot(m_axis[0],m_axis[1]),-1,+1)));
02825         m_drift         *=      m_erp/dt;
02826         m_massmatrix=   AngularImpulseMatrix(m_bodies[0].invWorldInertia(),m_bodies[1].invWorldInertia());
02827         if(m_split>0)
02828         {
02829                 m_sdrift        =       m_massmatrix*(m_drift*m_split);
02830                 m_drift         *=      1-m_split;
02831         }
02832         m_drift /=(btScalar)iterations;
02833 }
02834 
02835 //
02836 void                            btSoftBody::AJoint::Solve(btScalar dt,btScalar sor)
02837 {
02838         const btVector3         va=m_bodies[0].angularVelocity();
02839         const btVector3         vb=m_bodies[1].angularVelocity();
02840         const btVector3         vr=va-vb;
02841         const btScalar          sp=btDot(vr,m_axis[0]);
02842         const btVector3         vc=vr-m_axis[0]*m_icontrol->Speed(this,sp);
02843         btSoftBody::Impulse     impulse;
02844         impulse.m_asVelocity    =       1;
02845         impulse.m_velocity              =       m_massmatrix*(m_drift+vc*m_cfm)*sor;
02846         m_bodies[0].applyAImpulse(-impulse);
02847         m_bodies[1].applyAImpulse( impulse);
02848 }
02849 
02850 //
02851 void                            btSoftBody::AJoint::Terminate(btScalar dt)
02852 {
02853         if(m_split>0)
02854         {
02855                 m_bodies[0].applyDAImpulse(-m_sdrift);
02856                 m_bodies[1].applyDAImpulse( m_sdrift);
02857         }
02858 }
02859 
02860 //
02861 void                            btSoftBody::CJoint::Prepare(btScalar dt,int iterations)
02862 {
02863         Joint::Prepare(dt,iterations);
02864         const bool      dodrift=(m_life==0);
02865         m_delete=(++m_life)>m_maxlife;
02866         if(dodrift)
02867         {
02868                 m_drift=m_drift*m_erp/dt;
02869                 if(m_split>0)
02870                 {
02871                         m_sdrift        =       m_massmatrix*(m_drift*m_split);
02872                         m_drift         *=      1-m_split;
02873                 }
02874                 m_drift/=(btScalar)iterations;
02875         }
02876         else
02877         {
02878                 m_drift=m_sdrift=btVector3(0,0,0);
02879         }
02880 }
02881 
02882 //
02883 void                            btSoftBody::CJoint::Solve(btScalar dt,btScalar sor)
02884 {
02885         const btVector3         va=m_bodies[0].velocity(m_rpos[0]);
02886         const btVector3         vb=m_bodies[1].velocity(m_rpos[1]);
02887         const btVector3         vrel=va-vb;
02888         const btScalar          rvac=btDot(vrel,m_normal);
02889         btSoftBody::Impulse     impulse;
02890         impulse.m_asVelocity    =       1;
02891         impulse.m_velocity              =       m_drift;
02892         if(rvac<0)
02893         {
02894                 const btVector3 iv=m_normal*rvac;
02895                 const btVector3 fv=vrel-iv;
02896                 impulse.m_velocity      +=      iv+fv*m_friction;
02897         }
02898         impulse.m_velocity=m_massmatrix*impulse.m_velocity*sor;
02899         
02900         if (m_bodies[0].m_soft==m_bodies[1].m_soft)
02901         {
02902                 if ((impulse.m_velocity.getX() ==impulse.m_velocity.getX())&&(impulse.m_velocity.getY() ==impulse.m_velocity.getY())&&
02903                         (impulse.m_velocity.getZ() ==impulse.m_velocity.getZ()))
02904                 {
02905                         if (impulse.m_asVelocity)
02906                         {
02907                                 if (impulse.m_velocity.length() <m_bodies[0].m_soft->m_maxSelfCollisionImpulse)
02908                                 {
02909                                         
02910                                 } else
02911                                 {
02912                                         m_bodies[0].applyImpulse(-impulse*m_bodies[0].m_soft->m_selfCollisionImpulseFactor,m_rpos[0]);
02913                                         m_bodies[1].applyImpulse( impulse*m_bodies[0].m_soft->m_selfCollisionImpulseFactor,m_rpos[1]);
02914                                 }
02915                         }
02916                 }
02917         } else
02918         {
02919                 m_bodies[0].applyImpulse(-impulse,m_rpos[0]);
02920                 m_bodies[1].applyImpulse( impulse,m_rpos[1]);
02921         }
02922 }
02923 
02924 //
02925 void                            btSoftBody::CJoint::Terminate(btScalar dt)
02926 {
02927         if(m_split>0)
02928         {
02929                 m_bodies[0].applyDImpulse(-m_sdrift,m_rpos[0]);
02930                 m_bodies[1].applyDImpulse( m_sdrift,m_rpos[1]);
02931         }
02932 }
02933 
02934 //
02935 void                            btSoftBody::applyForces()
02936 {
02937 
02938         BT_PROFILE("SoftBody applyForces");
02939 //      const btScalar                                  dt =                    m_sst.sdt;
02940         const btScalar                                  kLF =                   m_cfg.kLF;
02941         const btScalar                                  kDG =                   m_cfg.kDG;
02942         const btScalar                                  kPR =                   m_cfg.kPR;
02943         const btScalar                                  kVC =                   m_cfg.kVC;
02944         const bool                                              as_lift =               kLF>0;
02945         const bool                                              as_drag =               kDG>0;
02946         const bool                                              as_pressure =   kPR!=0;
02947         const bool                                              as_volume =             kVC>0;
02948         const bool                                              as_aero =               as_lift ||
02949                                                                                                         as_drag         ;
02950         //const bool                                            as_vaero =              as_aero &&
02951         //                                                                                              (m_cfg.aeromodel < btSoftBody::eAeroModel::F_TwoSided);
02952         //const bool                                            as_faero =              as_aero &&
02953         //                                                                                              (m_cfg.aeromodel >= btSoftBody::eAeroModel::F_TwoSided);
02954         const bool                                              use_medium =    as_aero;
02955         const bool                                              use_volume =    as_pressure     ||
02956                 as_volume       ;
02957         btScalar                                                volume =                0;
02958         btScalar                                                ivolumetp =             0;
02959         btScalar                                                dvolumetv =             0;
02960         btSoftBody::sMedium     medium;
02961         if(use_volume)
02962         {
02963                 volume          =       getVolume();
02964                 ivolumetp       =       1/btFabs(volume)*kPR;
02965                 dvolumetv       =       (m_pose.m_volume-volume)*kVC;
02966         }
02967         /* Per vertex forces                    */ 
02968         int i,ni;
02969 
02970         for(i=0,ni=m_nodes.size();i<ni;++i)
02971         {
02972                 btSoftBody::Node&       n=m_nodes[i];
02973                 if(n.m_im>0)
02974                 {
02975                         if(use_medium)
02976                         {
02977                                 /* Aerodynamics                 */ 
02978                                 addAeroForceToNode(m_windVelocity, i);
02979                         }
02980                         /* Pressure                             */ 
02981                         if(as_pressure)
02982                         {
02983                                 n.m_f   +=      n.m_n*(n.m_area*ivolumetp);
02984                         }
02985                         /* Volume                               */ 
02986                         if(as_volume)
02987                         {
02988                                 n.m_f   +=      n.m_n*(n.m_area*dvolumetv);
02989                         }
02990                 }
02991         }
02992 
02993         /* Per face forces                              */ 
02994         for(i=0,ni=m_faces.size();i<ni;++i)
02995         {
02996         //      btSoftBody::Face&       f=m_faces[i];
02997 
02998                 /* Aerodynamics                 */ 
02999                 addAeroForceToFace(m_windVelocity, i);  
03000         }
03001 }
03002 
03003 //
03004 void                            btSoftBody::PSolve_Anchors(btSoftBody* psb,btScalar kst,btScalar ti)
03005 {
03006         BT_PROFILE("PSolve_Anchors");
03007         const btScalar  kAHR=psb->m_cfg.kAHR*kst;
03008         const btScalar  dt=psb->m_sst.sdt;
03009         for(int i=0,ni=psb->m_anchors.size();i<ni;++i)
03010         {
03011                 const Anchor&           a=psb->m_anchors[i];
03012                 const btTransform&      t=a.m_body->getWorldTransform();
03013                 Node&                           n=*a.m_node;
03014                 const btVector3         wa=t*a.m_local;
03015                 const btVector3         va=a.m_body->getVelocityInLocalPoint(a.m_c1)*dt;
03016                 const btVector3         vb=n.m_x-n.m_q;
03017                 const btVector3         vr=(va-vb)+(wa-n.m_x)*kAHR;
03018                 const btVector3         impulse=a.m_c0*vr*a.m_influence;
03019                 n.m_x+=impulse*a.m_c2;
03020                 a.m_body->applyImpulse(-impulse,a.m_c1);
03021         }
03022 }
03023 
03024 
03025 //
03026 void btSoftBody::PSolve_RContacts(btSoftBody* psb, btScalar kst, btScalar ti)
03027 {
03028         BT_PROFILE("PSolve_RContacts");
03029         const btScalar  dt = psb->m_sst.sdt;
03030         const btScalar  mrg = psb->getCollisionShape()->getMargin();
03031         btMultiBodyJacobianData jacobianData;
03032         for(int i=0,ni=psb->m_rcontacts.size();i<ni;++i)
03033         {
03034                 const RContact&         c = psb->m_rcontacts[i];
03035                 const sCti&                     cti = c.m_cti;  
03036                 if (cti.m_colObj->hasContactResponse()) 
03037                 {
03038             btVector3 va(0,0,0);
03039             btRigidBody* rigidCol=0;
03040             btMultiBodyLinkCollider* multibodyLinkCol=0;
03041             btScalar* deltaV;
03042             
03043             if (cti.m_colObj->getInternalType() == btCollisionObject::CO_RIGID_BODY)
03044             {
03045                 rigidCol = (btRigidBody*)btRigidBody::upcast(cti.m_colObj);
03046                 va = rigidCol ? rigidCol->getVelocityInLocalPoint(c.m_c1)*dt : btVector3(0,0,0);
03047             }
03048                         else if (cti.m_colObj->getInternalType() == btCollisionObject::CO_FEATHERSTONE_LINK)
03049             {
03050                 multibodyLinkCol = (btMultiBodyLinkCollider*)btMultiBodyLinkCollider::upcast(cti.m_colObj);
03051                 if (multibodyLinkCol)
03052                 {
03053                     const int ndof  = multibodyLinkCol->m_multiBody->getNumDofs() + 6;
03054                     jacobianData.m_jacobians.resize(ndof);
03055                     jacobianData.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse.resize(ndof);
03056                     btScalar* jac=&jacobianData.m_jacobians[0];
03057                     
03058                     multibodyLinkCol->m_multiBody->fillContactJacobianMultiDof(multibodyLinkCol->m_link, c.m_node->m_x, cti.m_normal, jac, jacobianData.scratch_r, jacobianData.scratch_v, jacobianData.scratch_m);
03059                     deltaV = &jacobianData.m_deltaVelocitiesUnitImpulse[0];
03060                     multibodyLinkCol->m_multiBody->calcAccelerationDeltasMultiDof(&jacobianData.m_jacobians[0],deltaV,jacobianData.scratch_r, jacobianData.scratch_v);
03061                     
03062                     btScalar vel = 0.0;
03063                     for (int j = 0; j < ndof ; ++j) {
03064                         vel += multibodyLinkCol->m_multiBody->getVelocityVector()[j] * jac[j];
03065                     }
03066                     va = cti.m_normal*vel*dt;
03067                 }
03068             }
03069             
03070                         const btVector3         vb = c.m_node->m_x-c.m_node->m_q;
03071                         const btVector3         vr = vb-va;
03072                         const btScalar          dn = btDot(vr, cti.m_normal);           
03073                         if(dn<=SIMD_EPSILON)
03074                         {
03075                                 const btScalar          dp = btMin( (btDot(c.m_node->m_x, cti.m_normal) + cti.m_offset), mrg );
03076                                 const btVector3         fv = vr - (cti.m_normal * dn);
03077                                 // c0 is the impulse matrix, c3 is 1 - the friction coefficient or 0, c4 is the contact hardness coefficient
03078                                 const btVector3         impulse = c.m_c0 * ( (vr - (fv * c.m_c3) + (cti.m_normal * (dp * c.m_c4))) * kst );
03079                                 c.m_node->m_x -= impulse * c.m_c2;
03080                 
03081                 if (cti.m_colObj->getInternalType() == btCollisionObject::CO_RIGID_BODY)
03082                 {
03083                     if (rigidCol)
03084                         rigidCol->applyImpulse(impulse,c.m_c1);
03085                 }
03086                 else if (cti.m_colObj->getInternalType() == btCollisionObject::CO_FEATHERSTONE_LINK)
03087                 {
03088                     if (multibodyLinkCol)
03089                     {
03090                         double multiplier = 0.5;
03091                         multibodyLinkCol->m_multiBody->applyDeltaVeeMultiDof(deltaV,-impulse.length()*multiplier);
03092                     }
03093                 }
03094                         }
03095                 }
03096         }
03097 }
03098 
03099 //
03100 void                            btSoftBody::PSolve_SContacts(btSoftBody* psb,btScalar,btScalar ti)
03101 {
03102         BT_PROFILE("PSolve_SContacts");
03103         
03104         for(int i=0,ni=psb->m_scontacts.size();i<ni;++i)
03105         {
03106                 const SContact&         c=psb->m_scontacts[i];
03107                 const btVector3&        nr=c.m_normal;
03108                 Node&                           n=*c.m_node;
03109                 Face&                           f=*c.m_face;
03110                 const btVector3         p=BaryEval(     f.m_n[0]->m_x,
03111                         f.m_n[1]->m_x,
03112                         f.m_n[2]->m_x,
03113                         c.m_weights);
03114                 const btVector3         q=BaryEval(     f.m_n[0]->m_q,
03115                         f.m_n[1]->m_q,
03116                         f.m_n[2]->m_q,
03117                         c.m_weights);                                                                                   
03118                 const btVector3         vr=(n.m_x-n.m_q)-(p-q);
03119                 btVector3                       corr(0,0,0);
03120                 btScalar dot = btDot(vr,nr);
03121                 if(dot<0)
03122                 {
03123                         const btScalar  j=c.m_margin-(btDot(nr,n.m_x)-btDot(nr,p));
03124                         corr+=c.m_normal*j;
03125                 }
03126                 corr                    -=      ProjectOnPlane(vr,nr)*c.m_friction;
03127                 n.m_x                   +=      corr*c.m_cfm[0];
03128                 f.m_n[0]->m_x   -=      corr*(c.m_cfm[1]*c.m_weights.x());
03129                 f.m_n[1]->m_x   -=      corr*(c.m_cfm[1]*c.m_weights.y());
03130                 f.m_n[2]->m_x   -=      corr*(c.m_cfm[1]*c.m_weights.z());
03131         }
03132 }
03133 
03134 //
03135 void                            btSoftBody::PSolve_Links(btSoftBody* psb,btScalar kst,btScalar ti)
03136 {
03137 BT_PROFILE("PSolve_Links");
03138         for(int i=0,ni=psb->m_links.size();i<ni;++i)
03139         {                       
03140                 Link&   l=psb->m_links[i];
03141                 if(l.m_c0>0)
03142                 {
03143                         Node&                   a=*l.m_n[0];
03144                         Node&                   b=*l.m_n[1];
03145                         const btVector3 del=b.m_x-a.m_x;
03146                         const btScalar  len=del.length2();
03147                         if (l.m_c1+len > SIMD_EPSILON)
03148                         {
03149                                 const btScalar  k=((l.m_c1-len)/(l.m_c0*(l.m_c1+len)))*kst;
03150                                 a.m_x-=del*(k*a.m_im);
03151                                 b.m_x+=del*(k*b.m_im);
03152                         }
03153                 }
03154         }
03155 }
03156 
03157 //
03158 void                            btSoftBody::VSolve_Links(btSoftBody* psb,btScalar kst)
03159 {
03160         BT_PROFILE("VSolve_Links");
03161         for(int i=0,ni=psb->m_links.size();i<ni;++i)
03162         {                       
03163                 Link&                   l=psb->m_links[i];
03164                 Node**                  n=l.m_n;
03165                 const btScalar  j=-btDot(l.m_c3,n[0]->m_v-n[1]->m_v)*l.m_c2*kst;
03166                 n[0]->m_v+=     l.m_c3*(j*n[0]->m_im);
03167                 n[1]->m_v-=     l.m_c3*(j*n[1]->m_im);
03168         }
03169 }
03170 
03171 //
03172 btSoftBody::psolver_t   btSoftBody::getSolver(ePSolver::_ solver)
03173 {
03174         switch(solver)
03175         {
03176         case    ePSolver::Anchors:              
03177                 return(&btSoftBody::PSolve_Anchors);
03178         case    ePSolver::Linear:               
03179                 return(&btSoftBody::PSolve_Links);
03180         case    ePSolver::RContacts:    
03181                 return(&btSoftBody::PSolve_RContacts);
03182         case    ePSolver::SContacts:    
03183                 return(&btSoftBody::PSolve_SContacts);  
03184                 default:
03185                 {
03186                 }
03187         }
03188         return(0);
03189 }
03190 
03191 //
03192 btSoftBody::vsolver_t   btSoftBody::getSolver(eVSolver::_ solver)
03193 {
03194         switch(solver)
03195         {
03196         case    eVSolver::Linear:               return(&btSoftBody::VSolve_Links);
03197                 default:
03198                 {
03199                 }
03200         }
03201         return(0);
03202 }
03203 
03204 //
03205 void                    btSoftBody::defaultCollisionHandler(const btCollisionObjectWrapper* pcoWrap)
03206 {
03207 
03208         switch(m_cfg.collisions&fCollision::RVSmask)
03209         {
03210         case    fCollision::SDF_RS:
03211                 {
03212                         btSoftColliders::CollideSDF_RS  docollide;              
03213                         btRigidBody*            prb1=(btRigidBody*) btRigidBody::upcast(pcoWrap->getCollisionObject());
03214                         btTransform     wtr=pcoWrap->getWorldTransform();
03215 
03216                         const btTransform       ctr=pcoWrap->getWorldTransform();
03217                         const btScalar          timemargin=(wtr.getOrigin()-ctr.getOrigin()).length();
03218                         const btScalar          basemargin=getCollisionShape()->getMargin();
03219                         btVector3                       mins;
03220                         btVector3                       maxs;
03221                         ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(btDbvtVolume)               volume;
03222                         pcoWrap->getCollisionShape()->getAabb(  pcoWrap->getWorldTransform(),
03223                                 mins,
03224                                 maxs);
03225                         volume=btDbvtVolume::FromMM(mins,maxs);
03226                         volume.Expand(btVector3(basemargin,basemargin,basemargin));             
03227                         docollide.psb           =       this;
03228                         docollide.m_colObj1Wrap = pcoWrap;
03229                         docollide.m_rigidBody = prb1;
03230 
03231                         docollide.dynmargin     =       basemargin+timemargin;
03232                         docollide.stamargin     =       basemargin;
03233                         m_ndbvt.collideTV(m_ndbvt.m_root,volume,docollide);
03234                 }
03235                 break;
03236         case    fCollision::CL_RS:
03237                 {
03238                         btSoftColliders::CollideCL_RS   collider;
03239                         collider.ProcessColObj(this,pcoWrap);
03240                 }
03241                 break;
03242         }
03243 }
03244 
03245 //
03246 void                    btSoftBody::defaultCollisionHandler(btSoftBody* psb)
03247 {
03248         const int cf=m_cfg.collisions&psb->m_cfg.collisions;
03249         switch(cf&fCollision::SVSmask)
03250         {
03251         case    fCollision::CL_SS:
03252                 {
03253                         
03254                         //support self-collision if CL_SELF flag set
03255                         if (this!=psb || psb->m_cfg.collisions&fCollision::CL_SELF)
03256                         {
03257                                 btSoftColliders::CollideCL_SS   docollide;
03258                                 docollide.ProcessSoftSoft(this,psb);
03259                         }
03260                         
03261                 }
03262                 break;
03263         case    fCollision::VF_SS:
03264                 {
03265                         //only self-collision for Cluster, not Vertex-Face yet
03266                         if (this!=psb)
03267                         {
03268                                 btSoftColliders::CollideVF_SS   docollide;
03269                                 /* common                                       */ 
03270                                 docollide.mrg=  getCollisionShape()->getMargin()+
03271                                         psb->getCollisionShape()->getMargin();
03272                                 /* psb0 nodes vs psb1 faces     */ 
03273                                 docollide.psb[0]=this;
03274                                 docollide.psb[1]=psb;
03275                                 docollide.psb[0]->m_ndbvt.collideTT(    docollide.psb[0]->m_ndbvt.m_root,
03276                                         docollide.psb[1]->m_fdbvt.m_root,
03277                                         docollide);
03278                                 /* psb1 nodes vs psb0 faces     */ 
03279                                 docollide.psb[0]=psb;
03280                                 docollide.psb[1]=this;
03281                                 docollide.psb[0]->m_ndbvt.collideTT(    docollide.psb[0]->m_ndbvt.m_root,
03282                                         docollide.psb[1]->m_fdbvt.m_root,
03283                                         docollide);
03284                         }
03285                 }
03286                 break;
03287         default:
03288                 {
03289                         
03290                 }
03291         }
03292 }
03293 
03294 
03295 
03296 void btSoftBody::setWindVelocity( const btVector3 &velocity )
03297 {
03298         m_windVelocity = velocity;
03299 }
03300 
03301 
03302 const btVector3& btSoftBody::getWindVelocity()
03303 {
03304         return m_windVelocity;
03305 }
03306 
03307 
03308 
03309 int     btSoftBody::calculateSerializeBufferSize()      const
03310 {
03311         int sz = sizeof(btSoftBodyData);
03312         return sz;
03313 }
03314 
03316 const char*     btSoftBody::serialize(void* dataBuffer, class btSerializer* serializer) const
03317 {
03318         btSoftBodyData* sbd = (btSoftBodyData*) dataBuffer;
03319 
03320         btCollisionObject::serialize(&sbd->m_collisionObjectData, serializer);
03321 
03322         btHashMap<btHashPtr,int>        m_nodeIndexMap;
03323 
03324         sbd->m_numMaterials = m_materials.size();
03325         sbd->m_materials = sbd->m_numMaterials? (SoftBodyMaterialData**) serializer->getUniquePointer((void*)&m_materials): 0;
03326 
03327         if (sbd->m_materials)
03328         {
03329                 int sz = sizeof(SoftBodyMaterialData*);
03330                 int numElem = sbd->m_numMaterials;
03331                 btChunk* chunk = serializer->allocate(sz,numElem);
03332                 //SoftBodyMaterialData** memPtr = chunk->m_oldPtr;
03333                 SoftBodyMaterialData** memPtr = (SoftBodyMaterialData**)chunk->m_oldPtr;
03334                 for (int i=0;i<numElem;i++,memPtr++)
03335                 {
03336                         btSoftBody::Material* mat = m_materials[i];
03337                         *memPtr = mat ? (SoftBodyMaterialData*)serializer->getUniquePointer((void*)mat) : 0;
03338                         if (!serializer->findPointer(mat))
03339                         {
03340                                 //serialize it here
03341                                 btChunk* chunk = serializer->allocate(sizeof(SoftBodyMaterialData),1);
03342                                 SoftBodyMaterialData* memPtr = (SoftBodyMaterialData*)chunk->m_oldPtr;
03343                                 memPtr->m_flags = mat->m_flags;
03344                                 memPtr->m_angularStiffness = mat->m_kAST;
03345                                 memPtr->m_linearStiffness = mat->m_kLST;
03346                                 memPtr->m_volumeStiffness = mat->m_kVST;
